Replay API REPL-28

EPIC: Web3 Integration for Community and Utility

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 2:34 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Integrate Web3 technologies to enhance community engagement, provide unique value to users, and build a sustainable ecosystem within [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO], avoiding speculative elements and focusing on tangible benefits and practical applications.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Community Tokens and Rewards:*
#* *Utility Tokens:* Introduce a platform-specific utility token that can be earned by users through various activities (e.g., completing challenges, contributing content, participating in tournaments).
#* *Token-Based Rewards:* Use the token to reward user engagement and incentivize contributions to the community.
#* *Redemption:* Allow users to redeem tokens for in-game items, exclusive content, discounts on subscriptions or merchandise, or even access to unique events.
#* *Governance:* Explore the possibility of using the token for community governance, allowing users to vote on platform decisions or features.
# *Verified Digital Collectibles:*
#* *Achievement NFTs:* Issue unique NFTs to commemorate significant achievements (e.g., tournament wins,high rankings, skill milestones).
#* *Pro Player Collectibles:* Partner with pro players to create and sell limited edition NFTs showcasing their highlights or signature plays.
#* *Utility-Focused NFTs:* Explore NFTs that offer in-game benefits or unlock exclusive features within [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] (e.g., access to premium analysis tools, private coaching sessions).
#* *Transparency and Authenticity:* Ensure all NFTs are verified and traceable on the blockchain to guarantee authenticity and prevent fraud.
# *Decentralized Reputation System:*
#* *On-Chain Reputation:* Utilize blockchain technology to create a transparent and immutable reputation system for players.
#* *Skill Verification:* Allow players to prove their skills and achievements through verifiable on-chain data.
#* *Community Moderation:* Explore using reputation scores to empower community members to participate in moderation and content curation.
# *Transparent Revenue Sharing:*
#* *Creator Economy:* Implement a system where content creators (e.g., guide writers, video producers) can earn a share of revenue generated from their content through subscriptions or micropayments.
#* *Open Revenue Model:* Transparently share revenue data with the community to build trust and demonstrate the platform's commitment to fair compensation.
# *Educational Initiatives:*
#* *Web3 Education:* Offer educational resources to teach users about blockchain technology, cryptocurrencies,and NFTs in the context of gaming and esports.
#* *Responsible Gaming:* Promote responsible engagement with Web3 technologies, emphasizing the importance of understanding risks and avoiding scams.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Tangible Value:* Web3 integrations provide clear and tangible value to users, enhancing their experience on the platform and within the broader gaming ecosystem.
* *Transparency and Trust:* All Web3 interactions are transparent and auditable on the blockchain, building trust with users.
* *Community-Driven:* The Web3 features empower the community and give users a sense of ownership and participation.
* *Ethical Considerations:* The platform avoids speculative or exploitative practices and promotes responsible use of Web3 technologies.
* *Positive Impact:* Web3 integrations contribute to the growth and sustainability of the [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] platform and community.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Blockchain Selection:* Choose a suitable blockchain platform (e.g., Ethereum, Solana, Polygon) based on factors like scalability, cost, and environmental impact.
* *Smart Contract Development:* Develop secure and auditable smart contracts to manage tokenomics, NFTs, and other Web3 interactions.
* *Wallet Integration:* Integrate with popular Web3 wallets (e.g., MetaMask) to provide a seamless user experience.
* *Security:* Prioritize security measures to protect user assets and prevent fraud or exploitation.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*

!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNo1kM9qwzAMh19F6NzuAXIY5B-7DFaSscPiHdRYbUxjOzj2IJS--2wvvX36fRJCuuNoJWOBV0fLBO-dMABrOO8ls39zpJW5vpy6j-QAyqG2Wgej_Aaf9sZm_fkX1fDFTl0US6jtPPPo1Xnmp62HjpfgyStroN9Wz3o3TTS_bAJDP5GLu_a8HVoZxjyQEzZSmAQlHI-vUCWsMtYJ64xNwiZjm7DNWOIBNTtNSsZb70kI9BNrFlhElORuAoV5xD4K3vabGbHwLvABwyLJc6Mo_kRjcaF5jelC5tvaZ_34A240aRo?type=png|width=50%!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNo1kM9qwzAMh19F6NzuAXIY5B-7DFaSscPiHdRYbUxjOzj2IJS--2wvvX36fRJCuuNoJWOBV0fLBO-dMABrOO8ls39zpJW5vpy6j-QAyqG2Wgej_Aaf9sZm_fkX1fDFTl0US6jtPPPo1Xnmp62HjpfgyStroN9Wz3o3TTS_bAJDP5GLu_a8HVoZxjyQEzZSmAQlHI-vUCWsMtYJ64xNwiZjm7DNWOIBNTtNSsZb70kI9BNrFlhElORuAoV5xD4K3vabGbHwLvABwyLJc6Mo_kRjcaF5jelC5tvaZ_34A240aRo)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNo1kM9qwzAMh19F6NzuAXIY5B-7DFaSscPiHdRYbUxjOzj2IJS--2wvvX36fRJCuuNoJWOBV0fLBO-dMABrOO8ls39zpJW5vpy6j-QAyqG2Wgej_Aaf9sZm_fkX1fDFTl0US6jtPPPo1Xnmp62HjpfgyStroN9Wz3o3TTS_bAJDP5GLu_a8HVoZxjyQEzZSmAQlHI-vUCWsMtYJ64xNwiZjm7DNWOIBNTtNSsZb70kI9BNrFlhElORuAoV5xD4K3vabGbHwLvABwyLJc6Mo_kRjcaF5jelC5tvaZ_34A240aRo)|smart-link]

Replay API REPL-27

EPIC: Advanced Application Performance Monitoring (APM) Implementation

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 2:27 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Establish a robust and comprehensive Application Performance Monitoring (APM) strategy to ensure optimal performance, reliability, and user experience for [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO], utilizing industry-leading tools and best practices to gain deep insights into application behavior, identify bottlenecks, and proactively resolve issues.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Comprehensive Monitoring:*
#* *End-to-End Visibility:* Monitor the entire application stack, including frontend (web and mobile), backend services, databases, and infrastructure.
#* *Key Metrics:* Track critical performance metrics such as:
#** Response times (server-side, client-side)
#** Error rates and exceptions
#** Transaction traces and request flows
#** Resource utilization (CPU, memory, disk I/O, network)
#** User experience metrics (page load times, interactions)
#* *Real-time Alerts:* Set up alerts to notify relevant teams immediately when performance thresholds are breached or anomalies are detected.
# *Distributed Tracing:*
#* *Trace Context Propagation:* Implement distributed tracing to track requests across different services and components.
#* *Visualization:* Utilize tools like Jaeger or Zipkin to visualize request traces and identify performance bottlenecks in complex interactions.
#* *Root Cause Analysis:* Quickly pinpoint the root cause of performance issues by analyzing distributed traces.
# *Root Cause Analysis and Troubleshooting:*
#* *Error Profiling:* Profile application code to identify slow or resource-intensive functions.
#* *Log Analysis:* Correlate logs from different components to understand the sequence of events leading to errors or performance issues.
#* *Infrastructure Monitoring:* Monitor infrastructure metrics (e.g., CPU, memory, disk usage) to correlate them with application performance.
# *Synthetic Monitoring:*
#* *Proactive Testing:* Set up synthetic monitoring to simulate user interactions and proactively detect issues before they impact real users.
#* *Global Monitoring:* Use geographically distributed monitors to test performance from different locations.
#* *API Monitoring:* Monitor the performance and availability of critical APIs.
# *Real User Monitoring (RUM):*
#* *User-Centric Insights:* Gain insights into how real users experience the application in different browsers,devices, and locations.
#* *Performance Measurement:* Measure page load times, user interactions, and other client-side metrics.
#* *Error Reporting:* Collect data on JavaScript errors and exceptions that occur in the user's browser.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Comprehensive Monitoring:* All critical components and metrics are monitored effectively.
* *Rapid Issue Identification:* Performance bottlenecks and errors are quickly identified and isolated.
* *Root Cause Analysis:* The root cause of performance issues is determined efficiently.
* *Proactive Problem Solving:* Potential problems are detected before they impact users through synthetic monitoring.
* *Improved User Experience:* Application performance is optimized, resulting in a faster and more responsive experience for users.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *APM Tool Selection:* Evaluate and choose an APM tool that fits your requirements and budget (e.g., New Relic,Datadog, AppDynamics, Dynatrace).
* *Instrumentation:* Instrument your application code to collect relevant performance data.
* *Alerting and Notification:* Configure alerting thresholds and notification channels to ensure timely responses to performance issues.
* *Integration with Logging:* Integrate the APM tool with your logging infrastructure for centralized log analysis and correlation.
* *Infrastructure Monitoring:* Implement monitoring for your cloud infrastructure or on-premises servers.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*

!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNplkctuwjAQRX9l5DW0-ywq5QVEalSUwqZOF0MyEIvEjvyohBD_XqekMlV3Z-4dj6_HV9aolljEThrHDl6rWgIYd5hLIrvWOAh5etpWb5MHEPOVVtKSbD_vQsITbM6hTnmGFg9oaBYyXsijRmO1a6zTd9n3_7kr3pawU6q_H8l5qoZRU0fSiC-CUklhlfZB5pkrngk_UBycpRZ2GpvgrXmllIUUnSGIJfYXI8zsbfj7RdqOrGj-Dy14RdjD3pB-MOEZqn35GDqG5fIF8gmTgGnALGD-g6uA64CbgAVbsIH0gKL1v3GdjJr5nAPVLPLYoj7XrJY334fOKv-KhkV-o7RgbmzRUibQb3Jg0RF749UR5YdSv_XtG7mjm3A?type=png|width=747,height=430!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNplkctuwjAQRX9l5DW0-ywq5QVEalSUwqZOF0MyEIvEjvyohBD_XqekMlV3Z-4dj6_HV9aolljEThrHDl6rWgIYd5hLIrvWOAh5etpWb5MHEPOVVtKSbD_vQsITbM6hTnmGFg9oaBYyXsijRmO1a6zTd9n3_7kr3pawU6q_H8l5qoZRU0fSiC-CUklhlfZB5pkrngk_UBycpRZ2GpvgrXmllIUUnSGIJfYXI8zsbfj7RdqOrGj-Dy14RdjD3pB-MOEZqn35GDqG5fIF8gmTgGnALGD-g6uA64CbgAVbsIH0gKL1v3GdjJr5nAPVLPLYoj7XrJY334fOKv-KhkV-o7RgbmzRUibQb3Jg0RF749UR5YdSv_XtG7mjm3A)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNplkctuwjAQRX9l5DW0-ywq5QVEalSUwqZOF0MyEIvEjvyohBD_XqekMlV3Z-4dj6_HV9aolljEThrHDl6rWgIYd5hLIrvWOAh5etpWb5MHEPOVVtKSbD_vQsITbM6hTnmGFg9oaBYyXsijRmO1a6zTd9n3_7kr3pawU6q_H8l5qoZRU0fSiC-CUklhlfZB5pkrngk_UBycpRZ2GpvgrXmllIUUnSGIJfYXI8zsbfj7RdqOrGj-Dy14RdjD3pB-MOEZqn35GDqG5fIF8gmTgGnALGD-g6uA64CbgAVbsIH0gKL1v3GdjJr5nAPVLPLYoj7XrJY334fOKv-KhkV-o7RgbmzRUibQb3Jg0RF749UR5YdSv_XtG7mjm3A)|smart-link]

{noformat}graph LR
subgraph LeetGraming.PRO
A[Frontend]
B[Backend]
C[Database]
D[Infrastructure]
end
subgraph APM Tool
E[Comprehensive Monitoring]
F[Distributed Tracing]
G[Root Cause Analysis]
H[Synthetic Monitoring]
I[Real User Monitoring / RUM]
end

E --> F
E --> G

{noformat} 		21/mai/24 2:27 PM Em andamento purple
0|i0005r: Nenhum
Replay API REPL-26

EPIC: Developer Experience (DX) Enhancement

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 2:25 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Foster a world-class developer experience at [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] by implementing cutting-edge tools, processes, and practices that empower engineers to be productive, creative, and engaged, making the company a highly sought-after destination for top talent.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Modern Tech Stack and Tooling:*
#* *Languages and Frameworks:* Adopt modern and popular programming languages (e.g., TypeScript, C#, Python(?), Go) and frameworks (e.g.,Nextjs, React) that align with industry trends and developer preferences.
#* *Development Environment:* Provide developers with powerful and customizable workstations (e.g., high-end laptops, multiple monitors) and the freedom to choose their preferred operating systems and editors.
#* *Automation:* Automate repetitive tasks like code formatting, testing, and deployments using tools like Prettier, ESLint, Jest, and CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, etc.).
#* *Collaboration:* Utilize collaborative development tools (e.g., GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket) for version control, code reviews, and knowledge sharing.
# *Efficient Development Workflow:*
#* *Agile Methodology:* Embrace an agile development approach (e.g., Scrum, Kanban) that emphasizes collaboration, flexibility, and continuous improvement.
#* *Clear Documentation:* Maintain comprehensive and up-to-date documentation for projects, APIs, codebases, and internal processes.
#* *Code Reviews:* Establish a culture of regular code reviews to ensure code quality, share knowledge, and foster mentorship.
#* *Continuous Learning:* Encourage continuous learning and development through training programs, workshops, conferences, and access to online learning resources.
# *Positive and Inclusive Culture:*
#* *Open Communication:* Foster a culture of open communication, transparency, and trust, where developers feel comfortable sharing ideas and concerns.
#* *Recognition and Rewards:* Recognize and reward individual and team achievements to boost morale and motivation.
#* *Work-Life Balance:* Promote a healthy work-life balance with flexible work hours, remote work options, and generous vacation policies.
#* *Diversity and Inclusion:* Cultivate a diverse and inclusive environment where everyone feels valued and respected.
# *Opportunities for Growth:*
#* *Mentorship Program:* Establish a mentorship program to pair junior developers with experienced mentors for guidance and career development.
#* *Technical Leadership Paths:* Provide clear career paths for developers to grow into technical leadership roles.
#* *Hackathons and Innovation Time:* Encourage innovation by hosting regular hackathons and dedicating time for experimentation with new technologies and ideas.
# *Attractive Benefits and Perks:*
#* *Competitive Compensation:* Offer competitive salaries and benefits packages to attract and retain top talent.
#* *Stock Options or Equity:* Consider providing stock options or equity to align employee interests with the company's success.
#* *Additional Perks:* Offer perks like free meals, gym memberships, commuter benefits, or team-building activities to enhance employee satisfaction.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *High Employee Satisfaction:* Developers report high levels of satisfaction with their work environment, tools, and culture.
* *Increased Productivity:* The development team consistently delivers high-quality work on time and within budget.
* *Reduced Turnover:* Employee turnover rates are lower than industry averages.
* *Strong Employer Brand:* [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] is recognized as a top company to work for in the tech industry.
* *Talent Attraction:* The company attracts and retains top-tier software developers.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Technology Assessment:* Evaluate and select the most suitable technologies and tools for the company's needs and the developers' preferences.
* *Infrastructure:* Set up development, staging, and production environments with the necessary tools and resources.
* *Onboarding Process:* Develop a comprehensive onboarding process to help new developers get up to speed quickly.
* *Performance Management:* Implement a performance management system that provides regular feedback and opportunities for growth.
* *Company Culture:* Foster a positive and inclusive culture through team-building activities, social events, and open communication channels.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*

Replay API REPL-25

EPIC: Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and CI/CD Pipeline Implementation

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 2:18 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Establish a robust Infrastructure as Code (IaC) framework and a seamless Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipeline to automate the provisioning, configuration, and deployment of [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO]'s infrastructure and applications, ensuring scalability, reliability, and maintainability.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Infrastructure as Code (IaC):*
#* *Tool Selection:* Choose a leading IaC tool like Terraform or AWS CloudFormation to define and manage infrastructure resources declaratively.
#* *Modular Structure:* Organize infrastructure code into reusable modules for better maintainability and scalability.
#* *Environment Management:* Create separate environments (e.g., development, staging, production) to isolate changes and enable testing.
#* *Version Control:* Store IaC code in a version control system (e.g., Git) to track changes and enable collaboration.
# *CI/CD Pipeline:*
#* *Pipeline Definition:* Design a CI/CD pipeline using tools like GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD, or Jenkins.
#* *Stages:* Define distinct stages for building, testing, and deploying code (e.g., unit tests, integration tests, linting, security scans, deployment).
#* *Automation:* Automate every step of the pipeline, from code changes to production deployment.
#* *Feedback Loops:* Integrate feedback mechanisms (e.g., automated tests, monitoring alerts) to quickly identify and address issues.
#* *Rollbacks:* Implement automated rollback procedures in case of failed deployments.
# *Cloud Provider Selection (AWS or Tencent):*
#* *Evaluation:* Assess the pros and cons of both AWS (Amazon Web Services) and Tencent Cloud based on your specific requirements, such as:
#** Cost-effectiveness
#** Regional availability
#** Service offerings
#** Ease of use
#** Security features
#* *Decision:* Choose the cloud provider that best aligns with your needs and budget.
#* *Configuration:* Configure the chosen cloud provider's services (e.g., EC2, S3, RDS) using your IaC tool.
# *Containerization (Kubernetes):*
#* *Deployment Strategy:* If you choose Kubernetes, decide on a deployment strategy (e.g., rolling updates ,blue/green deployments) for seamless updates with minimal downtime.
#* *Resource Management:* Utilize Kubernetes to manage resource allocation, scaling, and load balancing for optimal performance.
#* *Monitoring:* Set up monitoring and logging for Kubernetes clusters to ensure health and stability.
# *Terraform and Pull Request (PR) Automation:*
#* *PR Workflow:* Integrate Terraform with your version control system (e.g., GitHub) to trigger infrastructure changes on pull requests.
#* *Automated Validation:* Use tools like {{terraform plan}} and {{terraform validate}} to automatically check for errors and compliance before applying changes.
#* *Security and Compliance Checks:* Integrate security scanning and compliance checks into the PR workflow to ensure adherence to best practices.
#* *Approval Process:* Implement an approval process for infrastructure changes to maintain control and accountability.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Automated Infrastructure:* Infrastructure resources (servers, databases, storage, etc.) are fully provisioned and configured using IaC.
* *Seamless CI/CD:* Code changes are automatically built, tested, and deployed to production with minimal manual intervention.
* *Scalable and Reliable:* The infrastructure can scale horizontally to handle increasing demand while maintaining high availability.
* *Secure:* Robust security measures are in place to protect against vulnerabilities and unauthorized access.
* *Maintainable:* The infrastructure code is well-structured, documented, and easy to update and maintain.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *IaC Best Practices:*
** Use modular code structure.
** Separate configuration from code.
** Use version control.
** Validate and test infrastructure changes.
* *CI/CD Tools:*
** Choose a suitable CI/CD platform.
** Define clear pipeline stages and automate tasks.
** Integrate with monitoring and logging tools.
* *Cloud Provider-Specific Considerations:*
** Familiarize yourself with the chosen cloud provider's services and best practices.
** Configure security groups, IAM roles, and other security measures.
* *Kubernetes (If Applicable):*
** Understand Kubernetes concepts and architecture.
** Design deployment strategies for your applications.
** Configure monitoring and logging for Kubernetes clusters.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*

!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNp9kUFvwjAMhf-KlTOIew-TSrtBtR3QQJu0lkNoDa2WOpGTICHEf18IZRtC2y1-7_Nz4hxFrRsUidixNC28vFYEYP3mUmbBg6yVtEN7NgDSMsc9Km2QYeFtizZCaxiPH2BaviHbTlPQyLFWMIFZ59bnVqSmotvwYpLlsOgMqo7wEv9XQozPyqyAJfI-zI7y3G8grV3A7frS_y8SQ_Jy6jvVDPy1itZjuULrBmcoovEUzsxyq7mHhZI0IHdyhGe_1NQYdRjoez3i87BQo_ThZ0kAN2sqaMvSOva18zys6bspRhRl-r6crJBqJAeZ0r4Jj9cMz36DTOjQXtPFSPTIveya8OXHOEu4FnusRBKOjeTPSlR0Cpz0Ti8PVIskzMaR8KaRDvNOhmv1ItlKZYNqJH1ofa1PX4Kfwik?type=png|width=1796,height=120!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNp9kUFvwjAMhf-KlTOIew-TSrtBtR3QQJu0lkNoDa2WOpGTICHEf18IZRtC2y1-7_Nz4hxFrRsUidixNC28vFYEYP3mUmbBg6yVtEN7NgDSMsc9Km2QYeFtizZCaxiPH2BaviHbTlPQyLFWMIFZ59bnVqSmotvwYpLlsOgMqo7wEv9XQozPyqyAJfI-zI7y3G8grV3A7frS_y8SQ_Jy6jvVDPy1itZjuULrBmcoovEUzsxyq7mHhZI0IHdyhGe_1NQYdRjoez3i87BQo_ThZ0kAN2sqaMvSOva18zys6bspRhRl-r6crJBqJAeZ0r4Jj9cMz36DTOjQXtPFSPTIveya8OXHOEu4FnusRBKOjeTPSlR0Cpz0Ti8PVIskzMaR8KaRDvNOhmv1ItlKZYNqJH1ofa1PX4Kfwik)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNp9kUFvwjAMhf-KlTOIew-TSrtBtR3QQJu0lkNoDa2WOpGTICHEf18IZRtC2y1-7_Nz4hxFrRsUidixNC28vFYEYP3mUmbBg6yVtEN7NgDSMsc9Km2QYeFtizZCaxiPH2BaviHbTlPQyLFWMIFZ59bnVqSmotvwYpLlsOgMqo7wEv9XQozPyqyAJfI-zI7y3G8grV3A7frS_y8SQ_Jy6jvVDPy1itZjuULrBmcoovEUzsxyq7mHhZI0IHdyhGe_1NQYdRjoez3i87BQo_ThZ0kAN2sqaMvSOva18zys6bspRhRl-r6crJBqJAeZ0r4Jj9cMz36DTOjQXtPFSPTIveya8OXHOEu4FnusRBKOjeTPSlR0Cpz0Ti8PVIskzMaR8KaRDvNOhmv1ItlKZYNqJH1ofa1PX4Kfwik)|smart-link]

{noformat}graph LR
subgraph Code Changes
A[Developer Pushes Code] --> B[Version Control / Git]
end

subgraph CI/CD Pipeline
B[Version Control / Git] --> C[CI Server / GitHub Actions]
C[CI Server / GitHub Actions] --> D[Build]
D[Build] --> E[Test]
E[Test] --> F[Terraform Plan]
F[Terraform Plan] --> G[Terraform Apply]
G[Terraform Apply] --> H[Deploy]
end

subgraph Infrastructure
H[Deploy] --> I[AWS/Tencent Cloud / or Kubernetes]
end
{noformat} 		21/mai/24 2:18 PM Em andamento purple

Replay API REPL-24

EPIC: Developer Ecosystem for Global API Adoption

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 2:12 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Establish [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] as the leading platform for esports replay analysis by building a robust developer ecosystem, fostering API adoption, and ensuring scalability, reliability, and future-proofing for seamless integration into a wide range of applications and services.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Comprehensive SDKs and Libraries:*
#* Develop well-documented and easy-to-use SDKs and libraries for popular programming languages (e.g.,Python, JavaScript, Java, C#).
#* Provide clear examples, tutorials, and guides to accelerate developer onboarding and integration.
#* Offer language-specific support and community forums for troubleshooting and knowledge sharing.
#* Continuously update and maintain SDKs to align with API changes and improvements.
# *Developer Portal and Documentation:*
#* Create a comprehensive developer portal as the central hub for all developer resources.
#* Provide detailed API documentation with clear explanations, examples, and use cases.
#* Offer interactive tools like API explorers or code sandboxes for experimentation.
#* Create a dedicated section for SDKs and libraries, with download links, installation instructions, and version histories.
#* Maintain a changelog to keep developers informed about API updates and changes.
# *API Design and Evolvability:*
#* Adhere to RESTful API design principles for consistency and ease of use.
#* Use clear and descriptive naming conventions for endpoints and resources.
#* Version the API to allow for backward compatibility and controlled introduction of new features.
#* Implement HATEOAS (Hypermedia as the Engine of Application State) to guide clients through available actions and resources.
#* Consider supporting GraphQL as an alternative for flexible and efficient data fetching.
# *Scalability and Performance:*
#* Design the API to be horizontally scalable, using load balancing and distributed architectures.
#* Optimize database queries and cache frequently accessed data to minimize response times.
#* Implement rate limiting and throttling to protect the API from abuse and ensure fair usage.
#* Monitor performance metrics (e.g., latency, throughput, error rates) and proactively address bottlenecks.
# *Community Engagement:*
#* Foster a vibrant developer community through forums, social media groups, and online events.
#* Encourage contributions to open-source SDKs and libraries.
#* Host hackathons or developer challenges to promote creative use of the API.
#* Offer incentives (e.g., early access to new features, premium support) to active developers and partners.
# *Partnerships and Integrations:*
#* Explore partnerships with other esports platforms, gaming communities, and data providers.
#* Integrate with popular streaming platforms (e.g., Twitch, YouTube) to enable real-time analysis during broadcasts.
#* Partner with analytics and coaching platforms to offer complementary services.
#* Explore opportunities for white-labeling the API or embedding it in third-party applications.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Developer Adoption:* A growing number of developers and companies actively use the replay-api to build applications and services.
* *Active Community:* A thriving developer community contributes to SDK development, shares knowledge, and provides feedback.
* *Reliable and Scalable API:* The API remains highly available, responsive, and scalable to meet increasing demand.
* *Positive Developer Experience:* Developers find the API easy to use, well-documented, and supported by comprehensive resources.
* *Industry Recognition:* [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] is recognized as a leading provider of esports data and analysis tools.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *API Gateway:* Implement a robust API gateway (e.g., Kong, Apigee) to handle authentication, rate limiting, and other cross-cutting concerns.
* *Database Technology:* Choose a scalable and performant database solution (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB) to handle large volumes of data.
* *Caching:* Utilize caching mechanisms like Redis or Memcached to improve response times for frequently accessed data.
* *Monitoring and Logging:* Implement comprehensive monitoring and logging for performance tracking, error detection, and security.
* *Developer Experience (DX):* Invest in tools and processes to enhance the developer experience, such as:
** *Interactive documentation with code examples*
** *SDK generation tools*
** *Community forums and support channels*
** *Regular communication and updates*

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*



!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNpFj01rAjEQhv9KmENP2h-wh8K6kVIUuujNpIfRTN3QzQeTpCDifzdbt3iaZ95nGHivcAqGoIEzYxzEdqe9EKkc55UovzM668-v_e5zckK0ai83SbyIrT0ysqX09RArJemXxhCJRR844ziLTrX9x8xSdcG54m2-zMla9cjZE6fBxscv8mYarVgu30Q34eqJ3R_KJ65hAY7YoTW1yHUSGvJAjjQ0FQ3yjwbtb_UOSw77iz9Bk7nQAko0mElarIUdNN84pppG9IcQ_vfbHeZvXGw?type=png|width=402,height=268!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNpFj01rAjEQhv9KmENP2h-wh8K6kVIUuujNpIfRTN3QzQeTpCDifzdbt3iaZ95nGHivcAqGoIEzYxzEdqe9EKkc55UovzM668-v_e5zckK0ai83SbyIrT0ysqX09RArJemXxhCJRR844ziLTrX9x8xSdcG54m2-zMla9cjZE6fBxscv8mYarVgu30Q34eqJ3R_KJ65hAY7YoTW1yHUSGvJAjjQ0FQ3yjwbtb_UOSw77iz9Bk7nQAko0mElarIUdNN84pppG9IcQ_vfbHeZvXGw)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNpFj01rAjEQhv9KmENP2h-wh8K6kVIUuujNpIfRTN3QzQeTpCDifzdbt3iaZ95nGHivcAqGoIEzYxzEdqe9EKkc55UovzM668-v_e5zckK0ai83SbyIrT0ysqX09RArJemXxhCJRR844ziLTrX9x8xSdcG54m2-zMla9cjZE6fBxscv8mYarVgu30Q34eqJ3R_KJ65hAY7YoTW1yHUSGvJAjjQ0FQ3yjwbtb_UOSw77iz9Bk7nQAko0mElarIUdNN84pppG9IcQ_vfbHeZvXGw)|smart-link]

Replay API REPL-23

EPIC: Multi-Tenancy Implementation (Resource Owner Strategy)

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 2:09 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Enable [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] to scale and support multiple tenants (e.g., organizations, teams, white-label partners) while ensuring secure data separation, customization, and potential for new product offerings.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Resource Owner Strategy:*
#* *Tenancy Model:* Implement a Resource Owner multi-tenancy model where each resource (demo files,analysis data, user profiles, etc.) is explicitly associated with a {{TenantID}}.
#* *Authentication:* Extend authentication to include {{TenantID}}, {{ClientID}} (for applications), {{GroupID}} (for teams), and {{UserID}} for comprehensive access control.
#* *Data Isolation:* Ensure strict data isolation between tenants to prevent unauthorized access or data leakage.
#* *Resource Ownership Transfer:* Develop mechanisms to allow secure transfer of resource ownership between tenants (e.g., for white-label partnerships).
# *Tenant-Specific Customization:*
#* *Branding:* Allow tenants to customize the platform's appearance (logos, colors, themes) to match their branding.
#* *Features:* Enable tenants to choose and configure the features they want to offer to their users.
#* *Pricing:* Provide flexibility for tenants to set their own pricing models (e.g., subscriptions, in-app purchases) if applicable.
#* *Custom Domains:* Enable tenants to use their own custom domain names for a white-label experience.
# *Scalable Infrastructure:*
#* *Database Architecture:* Design the database schema to efficiently handle multi-tenancy, considering options like:
#** Separate databases per tenant.
#** Shared database with tenant-specific schemas or tables.
#** Hybrid approaches combining both.
#* *Application Architecture:* Ensure the application code can handle multiple tenants concurrently without compromising performance or security.
#* *Infrastructure:* Consider using cloud-based infrastructure for scalability and flexibility to accommodate growth.
# *Data Migration and Transformation:*
#* *Ownership Transfer:* Develop tools and processes to facilitate the secure transfer of data ownership between tenants.
#* *Data Transformation:* Ensure data formats and structures are compatible during ownership transfers, and implement necessary transformations if needed.
#* *Auditing and Logging:* Maintain detailed logs of data migration and transformation processes for transparency and troubleshooting.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Tenant Isolation:* Data for each tenant is strictly isolated and inaccessible to other tenants.
* *Customization:* Tenants can successfully customize the platform's appearance, features, and pricing to match their needs.
* *White-Labeling:* The platform can be successfully white-labeled with custom domains and branding for partners.
* *Scalability:* The platform can handle a growing number of tenants and users without significant performance degradation.
* *Data Migration:* Data can be securely and reliably transferred between tenants with minimal disruption.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Database Technology:* Choose a database that supports multi-tenancy effectively (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
* *Tenant Identification:* Implement mechanisms to reliably identify the tenant associated with each request or operation.
* *Data Access Control:* Enforce strict data access control rules based on tenant, client, group, and user IDs.
* *Data Migration Tools:* Develop or utilize existing tools for data migration and transformation processes.
* *Monitoring and Logging:* Implement comprehensive monitoring and logging to track tenant activity and identify potential issues.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*


!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNpFj8EKwjAMhl8l5KyCettBmG6IICjqydVDXKMb2mx0LSLiu9vphrcv3x9I_hfmlWaM8GqpLmC9UwLQ-HM3MrulJVPKdbTdbdoMIM4OLCQOxqefmPdi0olFL6adSLJ9QZY1rORiqXHW585b7tI0i7crWJLjBz2_jkUraSGG4XAGaYvzPy7-mH4xwQEatoZKHaq82kChK9iwwiigJntTqOQd9si7av-UHKPwBg_Q1zpcTkoKlQ1GF7o3wdYkx6rq5_cHFzhcYg?type=png|width=415,height=268!

Replay API REPL-22

EPIC: Global Data Privacy Compliance and Security

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 2:05 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Establish and maintain [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO]'s commitment to the highest standards of data privacy and security worldwide, complying with GDPR, CCPA, LGPD, and other relevant regulations while implementing robust measures to protect user data and build trust.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Comprehensive Data Privacy Compliance:*
#* *GDPR, CCPA, LGPD:* Conduct a thorough assessment and implement measures to comply with the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), the Brazilian General Data Protection Law (LGPD), and any other relevant data protection laws in the regions where the platform operates.
#* *Data Minimization:* Collect only the minimum necessary personal data from users, ensuring it is relevant and proportionate to the services provided.
#* *Transparency and User Control:* Provide clear and accessible privacy notices, outlining data collection practices, purposes, and legal bases for processing. Empower users with tools to manage their data and exercise their rights (access, rectification, erasure, etc.).
#* *Consent Management:* Obtain explicit and informed consent for data processing activities, including granular options for opting in or out of specific features or data uses.
#* *Cross-Border Data Transfers:* Ensure compliance with data transfer mechanisms (e.g., Standard Contractual Clauses, Binding Corporate Rules) when transferring data across borders.
# *Robust Security Measures:*
#* *Encryption:* Utilize strong encryption algorithms (e.g., AES-256) for both data at rest (database encryption) and data in transit (HTTPS).
#* *Access Controls:* Implement strict access controls to restrict data access to authorized personnel based on the principle of least privilege.
#* *Vulnerability Management:* Conduct regular security assessments, penetration testing, and code reviews to identify and address vulnerabilities.
#* *Incident Response Plan:* Develop a comprehensive incident response plan to detect, contain, and remediate security incidents promptly and effectively.
# *Demo File and User Data Protection:*
#* *Consent for Sharing:* Obtain explicit consent before sharing demo files or user data with third parties, such as esports teams or sponsors.
#* *Anonymization and Pseudonymization:* Implement techniques to anonymize or pseudonymize data whenever possible to reduce the risk of re-identification.
#* *Secure Storage:* Store sensitive data, including demo files, in secure environments with appropriate encryption and access controls.
#* *Data Retention Policy:* Establish a clear data retention policy, specifying the retention periods for different types of data and ensuring data is deleted or anonymized when no longer needed.
# *User Authentication and Security:*
#* *Strong Authentication:* Enforce strong password policies and consider implementing passwordless authentication options (e.g., biometrics, security keys).
#* *Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA):* Enable MFA as an option or requirement for enhanced account security.
#* *Account Recovery:* Provide secure and user-friendly mechanisms for account recovery in case of lost credentials.
#* *Regular Security Awareness Training:* Educate employees and contractors about security best practices and the importance of data protection.
# *Third-Party Vendor Management:*
#* *Due Diligence:* Conduct thorough due diligence before engaging with third-party vendors who will process user data.
#* *Data Processing Agreements (DPAs):* Establish DPAs with all relevant vendors to ensure they comply with data protection requirements.
#* *Ongoing Monitoring:* Continuously monitor the security practices and compliance of third-party vendors.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Compliance with Global Regulations:* The platform demonstrates adherence to GDPR, CCPA, LGPD, and other relevant data protection laws.
* *Strong Security Posture:* User data is protected with industry-standard security measures, and the platform undergoes regular security audits.
* *User Trust:* Users feel confident that their data is handled responsibly and securely.
* *Industry Recognition:* [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] is recognized as a leader in data privacy and security within the esports industry.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Legal Expertise:* Engage legal counsel with expertise in international data protection laws to ensure full compliance.
* *Privacy by Design:* Embed privacy considerations into every stage of the development process.
* *Data Protection Impact Assessments (DPIAs):* Conduct DPIAs for high-risk processing activities.
* *Security Technologies:* Implement robust security technologies like firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and encryption solutions.

*Visual Representation (Mermaid Diagram):*



!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNo1kMFqwzAQRH9F6Jz0A3woOJbjBFJinPZSqYettXVErbWRpYIJ-fcqanV7uzPMLHvj_aSRF3xwMF_ZqVO0hM__AdE3Dqyh4antzooYK2Uj2u7jgTtZVW2ZsJKnphUJhTz7KzrW4RBG8GaiJe1rKcADa535gX5Nq728YB-c8St7QViCwz9rIwXaie3NiOwApMfYn4SDfFtidBliA3nTp_ikHOXr1Ti9bcE90oBgQBs9UUTSikq23T6zWtEuQ5VBZKgT7DM0GQ4ZjnzDLToLRsd_3R69isdTLCpeRNTgvhVXdI8-CH66rNTzwruAGx5mDR6FgfhZy4svGJe4nYHepynP919TyIDt?type=png|width=881,height=268!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNo1kMFqwzAQRH9F6Jz0A3woOJbjBFJinPZSqYettXVErbWRpYIJ-fcqanV7uzPMLHvj_aSRF3xwMF_ZqVO0hM__AdE3Dqyh4antzooYK2Uj2u7jgTtZVW2ZsJKnphUJhTz7KzrW4RBG8GaiJe1rKcADa535gX5Nq728YB-c8St7QViCwz9rIwXaie3NiOwApMfYn4SDfFtidBliA3nTp_ikHOXr1Ti9bcE90oBgQBs9UUTSikq23T6zWtEuQ5VBZKgT7DM0GQ4ZjnzDLToLRsd_3R69isdTLCpeRNTgvhVXdI8-CH66rNTzwruAGx5mDR6FgfhZy4svGJe4nYHepynP919TyIDt)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNo1kMFqwzAQRH9F6Jz0A3woOJbjBFJinPZSqYettXVErbWRpYIJ-fcqanV7uzPMLHvj_aSRF3xwMF_ZqVO0hM__AdE3Dqyh4antzooYK2Uj2u7jgTtZVW2ZsJKnphUJhTz7KzrW4RBG8GaiJe1rKcADa535gX5Nq728YB-c8St7QViCwz9rIwXaie3NiOwApMfYn4SDfFtidBliA3nTp_ikHOXr1Ti9bcE90oBgQBs9UUTSikq23T6zWtEuQ5VBZKgT7DM0GQ4ZjnzDLToLRsd_3R69isdTLCpeRNTgvhVXdI8-CH66rNTzwruAGx5mDR6FgfhZy4svGJe4nYHepynP919TyIDt)|smart-link]

Replay API REPL-21

EPIC: Performance & Rank Tracking

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 2:01 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Enhance [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO]'s value proposition by integrating features that allow users to track their performance, rank progression, and competitive standing within the platform and across different games.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Individual Performance Tracking:*
#* *Skill Rating:* Develop a proprietary skill rating system that reflects a player's overall performance and improvement over time.
#* *Match History and Stats:* Provide a detailed overview of match history, including wins, losses, K/D ratios,ADR, and other relevant stats.
#* *Progress Visualization:* Implement graphs and charts to visualize progress over time, highlighting areas of improvement and strengths.
#* *Goal Setting:* Allow users to set personal goals and track their progress towards achieving them.
# *Rank and Leaderboard Integration:*
#* *Official Rank Integration:* Integrate with official ranking systems for supported games (e.g., FACEIT,ESEA, ranked matchmaking in various games) to display and track users' ranks.
#* [*LeetGraming.PRO*|http://LeetGraming.PRO] *Leaderboards:* Create internal leaderboards based on various metrics (e.g., skill rating,win rate, specific achievements) to foster competition and community engagement.
#* *Rank Comparison:* Allow users to compare their rank and stats with friends, teammates, or other players within the community.
# *Team Performance Tracking:*
#* *Team Stats and Rankings:* Track and display team-level statistics, including win rates, map performance,and overall rankings.
#* *Team Progress Visualization:* Create visualizations that highlight team performance trends over time,individual contributions, and areas for improvement.
#* *Scrimmage and Tournament Tracking:* Integrate with tournament platforms to track team results and performance in competitive settings.
# *Personalized Benchmarks and Comparisons:*
#* *Peer Comparison:* Allow users to compare their stats and performance with similar players based on skill level, playstyle, or other factors.
#* *Pro Player Benchmarks:* Provide benchmarks and comparisons with professional players to give users a reference point for their own progress.
#* *Personalized Goals:* Help users set realistic goals based on their current skill level and historical performance data.
# *Progress Sharing and Social Features:*
#* *Profile Customization:* Allow users to showcase their achievements, ranks, and stats on their profiles.
#* *Social Sharing:* Enable users to share their progress, achievements, and match analyses with friends and the community.
#* *In-App Competitions:* Organize regular in-app competitions or challenges based on rankings and achievements.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Accurate Tracking:* The platform accurately tracks individual and team performance data across various games.
* *Meaningful Insights:* Users gain valuable insights into their performance, strengths, weaknesses, and progress over time.
* *Engaging Competition:* Leaderboards and comparisons foster a healthy competitive spirit within the community.
* *Personalized Experience:* The platform tailors recommendations and challenges to individual skill levels and goals.
* *Social Interaction:* Users can share their progress and achievements, leading to increased engagement and community building.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Data Integration:* Integrate with official ranking systems or APIs to fetch and display accurate rank data.
* *Data Storage:* Implement a scalable database to store and manage large amounts of performance data.
* *Analytics and Reporting:* Utilize analytics tools to track user progress, analyze performance trends, and generate reports.
* *Social Features:* Integrate with social media platforms or build custom sharing features within the platform.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*

!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNpNkD1uwzAMha8icOiU9AAeCvgPXQoksDPV7MBITCzYogzZHpIgd6-stkC37_GRfCAfoL1hyOAaaOrVR4Myr-dfwby8B3JWrq_H5oCiVN4dOVx8cCSa1SmQHqL7tVlF15AM6iWOkeFw9hRMMsruxOTUv8FUrrZVsxca7Z2NKlh07ygMc3LrrvXa0qjansJPBItBQcnVfv-mCpQiQYlSJqhQqgQ1Sp0ghx04jpHWxAMf21qEpWfHCFlEE9MQUJ6xj9bFtzfRkC1h5R2sk6GFK0vxFQ6yC41zrE4kn97_6ec3yAZp5g?type=png|width=351,height=436!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNpNkD1uwzAMha8icOiU9AAeCvgPXQoksDPV7MBITCzYogzZHpIgd6-stkC37_GRfCAfoL1hyOAaaOrVR4Myr-dfwby8B3JWrq_H5oCiVN4dOVx8cCSa1SmQHqL7tVlF15AM6iWOkeFw9hRMMsruxOTUv8FUrrZVsxca7Z2NKlh07ygMc3LrrvXa0qjansJPBItBQcnVfv-mCpQiQYlSJqhQqgQ1Sp0ghx04jpHWxAMf21qEpWfHCFlEE9MQUJ6xj9bFtzfRkC1h5R2sk6GFK0vxFQ6yC41zrE4kn97_6ec3yAZp5g)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNpNkD1uwzAMha8icOiU9AAeCvgPXQoksDPV7MBITCzYogzZHpIgd6-stkC37_GRfCAfoL1hyOAaaOrVR4Myr-dfwby8B3JWrq_H5oCiVN4dOVx8cCSa1SmQHqL7tVlF15AM6iWOkeFw9hRMMsruxOTUv8FUrrZVsxca7Z2NKlh07ygMc3LrrvXa0qjansJPBItBQcnVfv-mCpQiQYlSJqhQqgQ1Sp0ghx04jpHWxAMf21qEpWfHCFlEE9MQUJ6xj9bFtzfRkC1h5R2sk6GFK0vxFQ6yC41zrE4kn97_6ec3yAZp5g)|smart-link]

Replay API REPL-20

EPIC: Content Creation and Curation

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:59 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Establish [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] as a central hub for high-quality educational content and community-driven resources related to esports and skill improvement, attracting a wider audience and increasing user engagement.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *In-House Content Production:*
#* Create a dedicated content team (writers, video editors, designers) to produce original content.
#* Develop various content formats:
#** In-depth guides and tutorials covering game mechanics, strategies, and meta analysis.
#** Video content, including match breakdowns, tutorials, and interviews with pro players/coaches.
#** Blog articles on esports news, trends, and player stories.
#** Infographics and visual content to summarize complex information effectively.
#* Publish content regularly on the platform's blog, YouTube channel, and social media.
# *Community-Generated Content:*
#* Encourage and incentivize users to create and share their own content (guides, videos, tips).
#* Implement a user-friendly content creation and submission system.
#* Curate high-quality user-generated content and feature it prominently on the platform.
#* Create a system for rewarding or recognizing outstanding contributions from the community.
# *Content Partnerships:*
#* Collaborate with established content creators, esports organizations, and professional players to produce exclusive content.
#* Partner with educational institutions or platforms to offer co-created courses or certifications.
#* Sponsor community tournaments and events to generate engaging content around them.
# *Content Organization and Discovery:*
#* Develop a well-organized content library with clear categories and search functionality.
#* Implement a recommendation engine to suggest relevant content based on user preferences, skill level, and analyzed replays.
#* Utilize tags and metadata to make content easily discoverable.
#* Promote popular or trending content through curated lists and featured sections.
# *Monetization of Content (Optional):*
#* Explore options for monetizing premium content through:
#** Paid subscriptions for exclusive access to in-depth guides, videos, or courses.
#** One-time purchases for individual pieces of premium content.
#** Partnerships with content creators to offer paid memberships or subscriptions.
#* Consider offering free content as a teaser to attract users and demonstrate value.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *High-Quality Content:* The platform offers a diverse range of engaging and informative content that caters to different learning styles and skill levels.
* *Active Community:* Users actively contribute to and engage with the content library.
* *Increased Traffic and Engagement:* The content attracts new users to the platform and increases overall user engagement.
* *Positive Brand Image:* The platform is recognized as a valuable resource for esports education and community interaction.
* *Revenue Generation (if applicable):* Monetization strategies generate additional revenue for the platform.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Content Management System (CMS):* Implement a CMS to manage content creation, editing, and publishing.
* *Search and Recommendation Engine:* Integrate or develop algorithms for effective content discovery and personalization.
* *Video Hosting and Streaming:* If video content is a major component, choose a reliable video hosting or streaming platform.
* *Monetization Platform:* If applicable, integrate with a payment gateway and subscription management system for premium content.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*

!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNpVjzFvwjAQhf-KdTNp9wyVIEFtJSoQbLU7HOQgVvHZss9DQPz3OhEZun3vu6eT3h1OviOo4RIx9GqzN5zy8RmI5D2is3x52e23hpVa6k-uPnxOpBrPQiw_o17pxjuX2crwzzd6h1GYYuptSJNq9bOgNvYYMQ6TXesvzyT2hmI9q1e1DSPgtVyJO8OGl6qq3lRreDVDM0M7wRoW4Cg6tF3Zcx_fGpCeHBmoC3YYfw0YfpQeZvGHgU9QS8y0gBw6FGotluUO6jNeU7EB-dv7OT_-AHfVZXM?type=png|width=586,height=268!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNpVjzFvwjAQhf-KdTNp9wyVIEFtJSoQbLU7HOQgVvHZss9DQPz3OhEZun3vu6eT3h1OviOo4RIx9GqzN5zy8RmI5D2is3x52e23hpVa6k-uPnxOpBrPQiw_o17pxjuX2crwzzd6h1GYYuptSJNq9bOgNvYYMQ6TXesvzyT2hmI9q1e1DSPgtVyJO8OGl6qq3lRreDVDM0M7wRoW4Cg6tF3Zcx_fGpCeHBmoC3YYfw0YfpQeZvGHgU9QS8y0gBw6FGotluUO6jNeU7EB-dv7OT_-AHfVZXM)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNpVjzFvwjAQhf-KdTNp9wyVIEFtJSoQbLU7HOQgVvHZss9DQPz3OhEZun3vu6eT3h1OviOo4RIx9GqzN5zy8RmI5D2is3x52e23hpVa6k-uPnxOpBrPQiw_o17pxjuX2crwzzd6h1GYYuptSJNq9bOgNvYYMQ6TXesvzyT2hmI9q1e1DSPgtVyJO8OGl6qq3lRreDVDM0M7wRoW4Cg6tF3Zcx_fGpCeHBmoC3YYfw0YfpQeZvGHgU9QS8y0gBw6FGotluUO6jNeU7EB-dv7OT_-AHfVZXM)|smart-link]

Replay API REPL-19

EPIC: Customer Support and Feedback Mechanisms

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:58 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Establish comprehensive customer support channels and robust feedback mechanisms to ensure user satisfaction, address issues promptly, and gather valuable insights for continuous improvement of the [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] platform.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Help Center and Knowledge Base:*
#* Create a comprehensive help center or knowledge base with articles, guides, and FAQs to address common questions and issues.
#* Organize content by topic and provide search functionality for easy access to relevant information.
#* Regularly update the knowledge base with new content and solutions.
# *Ticketing System:*
#* Implement a ticketing system to handle user inquiries, bug reports, and feature requests.
#* Prioritize tickets based on urgency and severity.
#* Assign tickets to appropriate team members for resolution.
#* Track ticket status and provide timely updates to users.
#* Analyze ticket data to identify recurring issues and areas for improvement.
# *Live Chat and Chatbots:*
#* Offer live chat support during peak hours or for premium subscribers.
#* Deploy chatbots to handle basic inquiries and route complex issues to human agents.
#* Train chatbots to understand user intent and provide accurate responses.
#* Integrate chatbots with the knowledge base for self-service support.
# *Community Forums and Support Groups:*
#* Foster a community-driven support system through forums or dedicated support groups.
#* Encourage experienced users to help and mentor newcomers.
#* Monitor community discussions to identify emerging issues and gather feedback.
#* Engage with the community by answering questions, addressing concerns, and acknowledging helpful contributions.
# *Feedback Collection and Analysis:*
#* Implement various channels for collecting user feedback, such as:
#** In-app feedback forms or surveys.
#** Feedback widgets or buttons on key pages.
#** Email feedback options.
#** Social media channels for informal feedback.
#* Analyze feedback data to identify trends, pain points, and areas for improvement.
#* Prioritize feedback-driven enhancements and communicate changes to users.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Timely and Effective Support:* User inquiries and issues are resolved promptly and to the user's satisfaction.
* *Accessible Resources:* Users can easily find answers to their questions through the help center, knowledge base, or community forums.
* *Positive User Experience:* Interactions with customer support are positive and helpful.
* *Continuous Improvement:* Feedback is regularly collected, analyzed, and used to drive improvements to the platform.
* *High Satisfaction Ratings:* Users rate their support experience positively and feel heard.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Help Desk Software:* Choose a suitable help desk software or ticketing system (e.g., Zendesk, Freshdesk, Jira Service Desk) to manage support requests.
* *Chatbot Platform:* Select a chatbot platform (e.g., Dialogflow, Rasa) or build a custom chatbot using natural language processing (NLP) techniques.
* *Feedback Analytics:* Utilize analytics tools to collect, analyze, and visualize feedback data.
* *Integration with CRM:* Integrate customer support tools with your CRM (Customer Relationship Management) system for a holistic view of user interactions.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*


!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNo1UM1OwzAMfhUr5w3uPSCt6QYSk0AbJxoObmPaqI1TpS6omvbupBs9-fu1ZF9UHSypTDURhxaOJ8PjVP0TInmO6B03D--nN8MAu_KF-gE0sVCER3jl8NuTbQhyHOlrieTlh6s7ktSC8zwK-Zusy6P7IdAtSuotowoy3qyi1MH7iZ3McAhx8nd5Xx6IbIV1Bzr0PdXiAieH2Bo2vIPt9gn2hvMV6BUUd6A2ylP06Gy677KsNEpa8mRUlqDF2Bll-JpyOEk4z1yrTOJEGzUNFoUKh-kTXmXf2I9JHZA_Q1j59Q8IKGmu?type=png|width=921,height=184!

Replay API REPL-18

EPIC: Data Science and Machine Learning Initiatives

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:56 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Utilize advanced data science and machine learning techniques to unlock the full potential of the vast amount of data collected by [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO], enhancing analysis, personalization, and overall user experience.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Advanced Statistical Modeling:*
#* Develop sophisticated statistical models to analyze player and team performance trends.
#* Identify hidden patterns and correlations within the data that can provide deeper insights into gameplay.
#* Use statistical analysis to evaluate the effectiveness of different strategies and tactics.
#* Provide users with data-driven recommendations based on statistically significant findings.
# *Predictive Modeling:*
#* Build predictive models to forecast:
#** Match outcomes based on pre-game data (e.g., player stats, map history).
#** In-game events like round wins, clutch success, and individual player performance.
#** Future player and team rankings based on skill progression.
#* Use these models to provide users with probabilities and insights into potential outcomes.
# *Recommendation Engine:*
#* Develop a robust recommendation engine that suggests:
#** Personalized training plans and exercises based on individual weaknesses and strengths.
#** Relevant pro player demos and matches for study.
#** Optimal strategies and tactics for specific game scenarios.
#* Continuously refine the engine based on user feedback and engagement data to improve recommendation accuracy.
# *Anomaly Detection:*
#* Implement anomaly detection algorithms to identify unusual or suspicious gameplay patterns.
#* Detect potential cheating, scripting, or exploiting of game mechanics.
#* Alert moderators or administrators to investigate and take appropriate action.
#* Use anomaly detection to identify outliers in performance data for further analysis.
# *Data Visualization and Exploration:*
#* Create interactive dashboards and visualizations to empower users to explore their data.
#* Offer advanced filtering and segmentation options to isolate specific aspects of gameplay.
#* Provide tools for users to visualize their progress over time and compare their performance to others.
#* Enable the creation of custom reports and visualizations to meet specific user needs.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Enhanced Insights:* The platform provides deeper and more actionable insights than competitors, thanks to advanced data analysis techniques.
* *Improved Personalization:* Users receive highly relevant and personalized recommendations that accelerate their skill development.
* *Accurate Predictions:* Predictive models provide reliable forecasts of match outcomes and individual player performance.
* *Fair Play:* Anomaly detection helps maintain a fair and competitive environment by identifying and addressing suspicious behavior.
* *User Empowerment:* Users have the tools and visualizations to explore and understand their data on their own terms.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Data Infrastructure:* Invest in scalable data storage and processing infrastructure to handle large volumes of data.
* *Machine Learning Tools and Libraries:* Select appropriate ML frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) and libraries (e.g., scikit-learn) for model development and deployment.
* *Data Science Expertise:* Recruit or collaborate with experienced data scientists and machine learning engineers.
* *Data Privacy and Security:* Ensure compliance with data privacy regulations and protect user data from unauthorized access.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*

!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNqNkstOwzAQRX9l5AWr9geyQAqkhQUIlEgscLoYnKG18CPyA6lU_XcmqSoVSFF3nvGc63tH3gnlOxKFWAfsN_BQtw4g5rdDWWFCaHwOioY-QCkrsh6W2lBcwXx-DTeydGi2UUdYuLV2tBomyXU_hH7NHMT-oqPirWwSJh2TVmjgke2ZuPqXqORzoE6rpD_pImAha1LeWrbJL3l3av0stOS2t3wBFSVSAzeZ9SmnPqeD1GSWUe1OvuiY0eiv0UGEK6ip9yEdrU-Fuow8l-4yeirmSN7L0hDPMTHYCXi6ATETloJF3fFf2g3NVqQNWWpFwccOw0crWrfnOczJN1unRJFCppnIPdukSiOvz4riHU3kbo_u1ftjvf8GCKHnHg?type=png|width=911,height=372!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNqNkstOwzAQRX9l5AWr9geyQAqkhQUIlEgscLoYnKG18CPyA6lU_XcmqSoVSFF3nvGc63tH3gnlOxKFWAfsN_BQtw4g5rdDWWFCaHwOioY-QCkrsh6W2lBcwXx-DTeydGi2UUdYuLV2tBomyXU_hH7NHMT-oqPirWwSJh2TVmjgke2ZuPqXqORzoE6rpD_pImAha1LeWrbJL3l3av0stOS2t3wBFSVSAzeZ9SmnPqeD1GSWUe1OvuiY0eiv0UGEK6ip9yEdrU-Fuow8l-4yeirmSN7L0hDPMTHYCXi6ATETloJF3fFf2g3NVqQNWWpFwccOw0crWrfnOczJN1unRJFCppnIPdukSiOvz4riHU3kbo_u1ftjvf8GCKHnHg)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNqNkstOwzAQRX9l5AWr9geyQAqkhQUIlEgscLoYnKG18CPyA6lU_XcmqSoVSFF3nvGc63tH3gnlOxKFWAfsN_BQtw4g5rdDWWFCaHwOioY-QCkrsh6W2lBcwXx-DTeydGi2UUdYuLV2tBomyXU_hH7NHMT-oqPirWwSJh2TVmjgke2ZuPqXqORzoE6rpD_pImAha1LeWrbJL3l3av0stOS2t3wBFSVSAzeZ9SmnPqeD1GSWUe1OvuiY0eiv0UGEK6ip9yEdrU-Fuow8l-4yeirmSN7L0hDPMTHYCXi6ATETloJF3fFf2g3NVqQNWWpFwccOw0crWrfnOczJN1unRJFCppnIPdukSiOvz4riHU3kbo_u1ftjvf8GCKHnHg)|smart-link]

{noformat}graph LR
subgraph Data Source
A[Demo Files] --> B[Analysis Engine]
end
subgraph Analysis Engine
B[Analysis Engine] --> C[Statistical Models]

B[Analysis Engine] --> F[Anomaly Detection]
end
subgraph Output
C[Statistical Models] --> G[Visualizations & Reports]
D[Predictive Models] --> G[Visualizations & Reports]
E[Recommendation Engine] --> G[Visualizations & Reports]
F[Anomaly Detection] --> H[Alerts & Moderation]
end

Replay API REPL-17

EPIC: Internationalization and Localization (i18n/L10n)

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:55 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Expand [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO]'s global reach by implementing internationalization (i18n) and localization (l10n) features, enabling the platform to support multiple languages and cultural preferences.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Language Support:*
#* Identify target languages based on market research and user demographics.
#* Prioritize languages with the largest potential user base and esports communities.
#* Implement support for the initial set of languages (e.g., English, Spanish, Chinese, Korean, Portuguese).
#* Gradually add support for more languages based on user demand and resource availability.
# *Translation Management:*
#* Establish a system for managing translations of all UI elements, content, and documentation.
#* Utilize professional translation services or leverage community contributions for translation efforts.
#* Implement a translation memory tool to ensure consistency and efficiency in translations.
#* Develop a process for reviewing and approving translations for quality assurance.
# *Locale-Specific Formatting:*
#* Adapt the platform to handle different number formats, date formats, currencies, and measurement units based on user locale.
#* Ensure correct display of times and time zones for matches and events in different regions.
#* Consider cultural nuances and adapt the UI design and content presentation accordingly.
# *Content Localization:*
#* Translate educational content (guides, tutorials, articles) into supported languages.
#* Adapt in-game terminology and jargon to match local preferences and understanding.
#* Consider localizing marketing materials and promotional campaigns for specific regions.
# *User Interface Adaptation:*
#* Design the UI to seamlessly switch between languages and adapt to different text directions (e.g., left-to-right, right-to-left).
#* Ensure that all UI elements, including menus, buttons, and forms, are translated correctly and displayed appropriately for each language.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Multilingual Support:* The platform supports multiple languages with accurate and high-quality translations.
* *Locale Awareness:* The platform correctly handles locale-specific formatting, including number, date, currency,and measurement units.
* *Cultural Adaptability:* The UI design and content presentation are sensitive to cultural differences and preferences.
* *User Preference:* Users can easily select their preferred language and locale within the platform.
* *Positive User Feedback:* Users from different regions find the platform accessible and easy to use in their native language.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Internationalization Libraries:* Utilize i18n libraries or frameworks (e.g., react-intl, i18next) to manage translations and locale-specific formatting.
* *Translation Workflow:* Establish a streamlined workflow for managing translations, including file formats, version control, and review processes.
* *Content Management System:* If applicable, integrate the i18n solution with your CMS for efficient translation of content.
* *Testing:* Thoroughly test the platform in different languages and locales to ensure correct functionality and visual presentation.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*


!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNp9kM9OwzAMxl_FynnlAXpA6lpASJ1AK1xodjCJ10W0TpW6B5j27qR_0E7j9rO_77MTn5XxllSqmoD9Ccq9ZoBh_FxLInkK2Dlu7l73L5MGkNUlcjNiQ1BRS0ac5wMkyT1s67eAPLQ4tWCHHD0dsRyW4E15Dud16Q22lFQ9GXd0Bh596FAkLl8H_GuZhxR17lniTJid7mfetcZviHPwoX5_hsxiL9cEsdU8QbZYJtxeMb9isaDaqI7ig5yNBz1PglZyin_UKo1oMXxppfkSfTiKr77ZqFTCSBs19haFCofx8J1Kj9gOsdsjf3j_V19-AdpUjZo?type=png|width=481,height=436!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNp9kM9OwzAMxl_FynnlAXpA6lpASJ1AK1xodjCJ10W0TpW6B5j27qR_0E7j9rO_77MTn5XxllSqmoD9Ccq9ZoBh_FxLInkK2Dlu7l73L5MGkNUlcjNiQ1BRS0ac5wMkyT1s67eAPLQ4tWCHHD0dsRyW4E15Dud16Q22lFQ9GXd0Bh596FAkLl8H_GuZhxR17lniTJid7mfetcZviHPwoX5_hsxiL9cEsdU8QbZYJtxeMb9isaDaqI7ig5yNBz1PglZyin_UKo1oMXxppfkSfTiKr77ZqFTCSBs19haFCofx8J1Kj9gOsdsjf3j_V19-AdpUjZo)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNp9kM9OwzAMxl_FynnlAXpA6lpASJ1AK1xodjCJ10W0TpW6B5j27qR_0E7j9rO_77MTn5XxllSqmoD9Ccq9ZoBh_FxLInkK2Dlu7l73L5MGkNUlcjNiQ1BRS0ac5wMkyT1s67eAPLQ4tWCHHD0dsRyW4E15Dud16Q22lFQ9GXd0Bh596FAkLl8H_GuZhxR17lniTJid7mfetcZviHPwoX5_hsxiL9cEsdU8QbZYJtxeMb9isaDaqI7ig5yNBz1PglZyin_UKo1oMXxppfkSfTiKr77ZqFTCSBs19haFCofx8J1Kj9gOsdsjf3j_V19-AdpUjZo)|smart-link]

Replay API REPL-16

EPIC: [Tunning] Performance and Optimization

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:53 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Optimize [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO]'s performance across all aspects of the platform, ensuring fast response times, efficient resource utilization, and a seamless user experience even under heavy load.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Frontend Performance Optimization:*
#* *Code Optimization:* Minify and bundle JavaScript and CSS files.
#* *Image Optimization:* Compress images and utilize responsive image loading techniques.
#* *Lazy Loading:* Implement lazy loading for images and other non-critical resources.
#* *Caching:* Utilize browser caching for static assets.
#* *Performance Profiling:* Identify and address performance bottlenecks using browser profiling tools.
# *Backend Performance Optimization:*
#* *Database Query Optimization:* Optimize database queries for faster retrieval of data.
#* *API Response Optimization:* Minimize the size of API responses and utilize compression techniques.
#* *Efficient Algorithms:* Employ efficient algorithms for data processing and analysis.
#* *Load Testing:* Conduct regular load testing to simulate real-world usage and identify performance issues.
# *Demo Processing Optimization:*
#* *Parallel Processing:* Implement parallel processing for demo file parsing and analysis to reduce processing time.
#* *Cloud-Based Processing:* Utilize cloud resources for scalable and on-demand demo processing.
#* *Prioritization:* Prioritize demo processing based on user subscription levels or other criteria.
#* *Feedback Mechanism:* Provide users with real-time feedback on demo processing status and estimated completion time.
# *Monitoring and Error Tracking:*
#* *Real-time Monitoring:* Implement monitoring tools to track server performance, API response times, and error rates.
#* *Error Tracking:* Utilize error tracking services (e.g., Sentry, Rollbar) to capture and analyze errors in both frontend and backend.
#* *Alerting:* Set up alerts to notify the team of performance degradation or critical errors.
# *Continuous Optimization:*
#* *Regular Audits:* Conduct regular performance audits to identify areas for improvement.
#* *Performance Budgeting:* Set performance budgets for key metrics (e.g., page load time, API response time).
#* *Iterative Improvements:* Continuously iterate on code, infrastructure, and algorithms to maintain optimal performance as the platform grows.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Fast Page Load Times:* Ensure the landing page and other key pages load quickly.
* *Responsive Interface:* The UI should be responsive and interactive, even under heavy load.
* *Efficient Demo Processing:* Demo files should be processed and analyzed in a timely manner.
* *Minimal Errors:* The platform should experience minimal errors and downtime.
* *User Satisfaction:* Users should report a smooth and responsive experience on all devices and network conditions.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Performance Profiling Tools:* Utilize browser developer tools and backend profiling tools to identify bottlenecks.
* *Caching Solutions:* Implement caching mechanisms like Redis or Memcached to improve response times.
* *Cloud Infrastructure:* Consider using cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP) for scalable and on-demand resources.
* *Monitoring and Error Tracking Tools:* Integrate with monitoring and error tracking services like Datadog, New Relic, or Sentry.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*

!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNp1Ul1v6jAM_StRnscf4OFKpcDWrYzC9nTT--A1pkTLR-Umk9i0_37TUAbT2MuRfU7sY7v94I2TyKe8Jej2rNzWlrE-vBzTJTnr0cqBZCwT684ro95RsjxW_TvSM1EYaJGNInjl7CjlooT3AysdSGXbkZyLHJr9KR-7f1nOoHn9clyITUA6XGu9FFlVXBNuxWK3U41C61mmW0fK700_indimIU9Y-9_G2COxrGKXIN9H98c6wpRAYHWqC-ksee9yLUL8qfwICpSg__3AUuxRJQvcc-r_itnlY9VJ-uV2CLoSdwTL7Sx16NYEDlizxTbnem1yDTSryvm8asqG1zoWWE6cm9o4rWOpVW0a4MGYlmQyp8OtxEV0s6RAdsgmwXZoj_7bUXhkeKSb3jZsT-7D0HGJpM_bJYwTzgf6EUKlwlvE94NdJHC-4QPCcuBXqXwMeF6IKoUbhJu-Q03GIdUMv7SH4Ncc7-Pw9R8GkMJ9Frz2n7GdxC8ezrYhk89BbzhoZPgca4g3sjw6Q50H9kO7F_nTvnnf3iBClE?type=png|width=269,height=1728!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNp1Ul1v6jAM_StRnscf4OFKpcDWrYzC9nTT--A1pkTLR-Umk9i0_37TUAbT2MuRfU7sY7v94I2TyKe8Jej2rNzWlrE-vBzTJTnr0cqBZCwT684ro95RsjxW_TvSM1EYaJGNInjl7CjlooT3AysdSGXbkZyLHJr9KR-7f1nOoHn9clyITUA6XGu9FFlVXBNuxWK3U41C61mmW0fK700_indimIU9Y-9_G2COxrGKXIN9H98c6wpRAYHWqC-ksee9yLUL8qfwICpSg__3AUuxRJQvcc-r_itnlY9VJ-uV2CLoSdwTL7Sx16NYEDlizxTbnem1yDTSryvm8asqG1zoWWE6cm9o4rWOpVW0a4MGYlmQyp8OtxEV0s6RAdsgmwXZoj_7bUXhkeKSb3jZsT-7D0HGJpM_bJYwTzgf6EUKlwlvE94NdJHC-4QPCcuBXqXwMeF6IKoUbhJu-Q03GIdUMv7SH4Ncc7-Pw9R8GkMJ9Frz2n7GdxC8ezrYhk89BbzhoZPgca4g3sjw6Q50H9kO7F_nTvnnf3iBClE)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNp1Ul1v6jAM_StRnscf4OFKpcDWrYzC9nTT--A1pkTLR-Umk9i0_37TUAbT2MuRfU7sY7v94I2TyKe8Jej2rNzWlrE-vBzTJTnr0cqBZCwT684ro95RsjxW_TvSM1EYaJGNInjl7CjlooT3AysdSGXbkZyLHJr9KR-7f1nOoHn9clyITUA6XGu9FFlVXBNuxWK3U41C61mmW0fK700_indimIU9Y-9_G2COxrGKXIN9H98c6wpRAYHWqC-ksee9yLUL8qfwICpSg__3AUuxRJQvcc-r_itnlY9VJ-uV2CLoSdwTL7Sx16NYEDlizxTbnem1yDTSryvm8asqG1zoWWE6cm9o4rWOpVW0a4MGYlmQyp8OtxEV0s6RAdsgmwXZoj_7bUXhkeKSb3jZsT-7D0HGJpM_bJYwTzgf6EUKlwlvE94NdJHC-4QPCcuBXqXwMeF6IKoUbhJu-Q03GIdUMv7SH4Ncc7-Pw9R8GkMJ9Frz2n7GdxC8ezrYhk89BbzhoZPgca4g3sjw6Q50H9kO7F_nTvnnf3iBClE)|smart-link]

Replay API REPL-15

EPIC: Social Features and Gamification

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:51 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Enhance user engagement and foster a vibrant community within [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] by implementing social features, gamification elements, and personalized challenges that encourage interaction, competition, and knowledge sharing.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Enhanced Social Interactions:*
#* *Activity Feeds:* Create personalized activity feeds showcasing friends' achievements, replay analyses, and community discussions.
#* *Direct Messaging:* Implement a private messaging system for users to communicate with friends and teammates.
#* *Groups and Clans:* Allow users to form groups and clans to share replays, strategies, and participate in team-based activities.
#* *Following and Recommendations:* Enable users to follow other players and receive personalized recommendations based on their interests and gameplay style.
# *Gamification Elements:*
#* *Achievements and Badges:* Award badges and achievements for completing challenges, reaching milestones, or demonstrating specific skills.
#* *Leveling Up System:* Introduce a leveling system that rewards users for consistent engagement and improvement, unlocking new features or content.
#* *Leaderboards and Rankings:* Display leaderboards for various metrics (e.g., win rate, K/D ratio, most improved player) to foster healthy competition.
#* *Challenges and Quests:* Create daily, weekly, or event-based challenges for users to complete, earning rewards and progressing through the platform.
# *Personalized Challenges:*
#* *AI-Generated Challenges:* Utilize the analysis engine to generate personalized challenges for each user based on their individual strengths and weaknesses.
#* *Community-Created Challenges:* Allow users to create and share custom challenges with the community.
#* *Challenge Tracking:* Track challenge progress, provide feedback, and offer rewards for completion.
# *Social Sharing and Rewards:*
#* *Replay Sharing:* Enable users to easily share their analyzed replays with friends or the community.
#* *Social Media Integration:* Integrate with popular social media platforms (e.g., Twitter, Discord) for sharing achievements and highlights.
#* *Referral Program:* Implement a referral program to incentivize users to invite friends to the platform,offering rewards for successful referrals.
# *Community Events and Tournaments:*
#* *Regular Events:* Organize regular online events, such as tournaments, community challenges, or live Q&A sessions with pro players or analysts.
#* *Exclusive Rewards:* Offer exclusive rewards and recognition for participation and achievements in community events.
#* *Partnerships:* Collaborate with esports organizations or sponsors to host larger-scale tournaments and events.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Increased Engagement:* Users spend more time on the platform and return more frequently due to social features and gamification elements.
* *Stronger Community:* A vibrant and active community forms around the platform, with users interacting,collaborating, and learning from each other.
* *Improved Retention:* Users are more likely to continue using the platform due to personalized challenges, rewards,and a sense of progress.
* *Positive Feedback:* Users express excitement and enjoyment of the social features and gamification elements.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Social Platform Integration:* Integrate with relevant social platforms for sharing and authentication.
* *Gamification Engine:* Develop or integrate a gamification engine to manage achievements, leaderboards, and challenges.
* *Real-time Communication:* Implement technologies for real-time communication (e.g., WebSockets) for features like live chat and notifications.
* *Personalization Algorithms:* Utilize machine learning to deliver personalized challenges and recommendations.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram)*

!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNo1kctOwzAQRX_F8hrovgukNmnSRxDQig0eFkMyNBbOOHKcogrx70zcdnd8fG1dj3917RvSc30M2Leq2gMP4-d1QRTLgJ3l48PL_hlYqYVZ1NGebDyrgqgZPia5NLkNVEf1RMOAR4knnZky-LEfZplDviRzU3jn_I9EZnuqfdcRNxitv-6v5PrW0onEx2G2xOZIl53CVKKdHFRvfTKlGGwofHoM1yJrk7XoHLGcmr2ONMSL35g99Q7P6tBiuNXbmoOvLTpp3VhMaie5LwpB5EvwMoQu6cpk0nTk6dWr09RMtBQHBl6o-_tHtQReJsiAswQ5cJ5gccusgFcJCuAiQQlcJlgDrxNsgDcJtsDbBDvgXYIKuLpcqO90R6FD28i3_U4FQcdWRgZ6Lthg-AYN_Cc5HKM_nLnW8xhGutNjL9Om3OL0Nj3_QjeI7ZHfvb-t__4B5vWudQ?type=png|width=597,height=772!

Replay API REPL-14

EPIC: Training Modules and Exercises

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:48 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Develop a comprehensive library of interactive training modules and exercises to help players of all skill levels improve their game sense, mechanics, and decision-making abilities in various esports titles.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Skill-Based Curriculum:*
#* Create a structured curriculum that covers a wide range of skills, including:
#** Aim training (e.g., target practice, tracking, flick shots)
#** Game sense exercises (e.g., map awareness, positioning, utility usage)
#** Decision-making drills (e.g., economic scenarios, clutch situations)
#** Communication and teamwork exercises (e.g., callout practice, coordinated strategies)
#* Organize the curriculum into modules with clear learning objectives and difficulty levels.
# *Interactive Exercises:*
#* Design interactive exercises that provide immediate feedback and allow players to practice specific skills in a controlled environment.
#* Incorporate gamification elements (e.g., scoring, rewards, challenges) to make the learning process more engaging and enjoyable.
#* Utilize customizable settings and difficulty levels to cater to different skill levels and learning styles.
# *Demo Integration:*
#* Allow users to link their practice sessions and training exercises to their uploaded demos for analysis and feedback.
#* Provide insights on how training performance translates to actual gameplay.
#* Offer recommendations for specific drills or exercises based on individual weaknesses identified in demo analysis.
# *Community Challenges and Competitions:*
#* Create community challenges and competitions centered around specific training modules.
#* Encourage friendly competition and collaboration among users.
#* Reward top performers with in-game items, exclusive content, or recognition within the community.
# *Progress Tracking and Assessment:*
#* Implement a system to track user progress through the training modules.
#* Provide detailed reports and visualizations on skill improvement over time.
#* Offer assessments or quizzes to evaluate mastery of specific skills or concepts.
#* Use this data to personalize recommendations and guide users towards the most relevant training content.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Engaging Learning Experience:* Training modules and exercises are fun, interactive, and effectively teach players new skills.
* *Personalized Training:* The platform tailors recommendations and exercises to individual player needs and skill levels.
* *Measurable Improvement:* Users experience noticeable improvements in their gameplay after engaging with the training modules.
* *Community Participation:* Users actively participate in community challenges and competitions.
* *Positive Feedback:* Users provide positive feedback on the effectiveness and enjoyment of the training features.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Exercise Development:* Design creative and challenging exercises that target specific skills and utilize game mechanics.
* *Gamification Engine:* Implement a gamification engine to track progress, award achievements, and create a sense of progression.
* *Feedback System:* Develop a robust feedback system that provides clear and actionable insights to users.
* *Integration with Demo Analysis:* Seamlessly connect training data with demo analysis for comprehensive performance evaluation.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*



!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNpVkMtOwzAQRX_F8rr5gSyQmscCCSREYUPMYrCHxIof0dhGVFX_HTsJoO7O-Hiur3zh0ivkNR8Jlok9PAvHWEgf2_hCoJ12I3v0KhkMRTJ2HE6zNqZqIKBibSLSMplk3zfdDPcuIoGM-gtZ_40kdcCw23ZovbXJ6Xhm7QTGoBt3iU4Jd_P-a0Bif2nebRHd8ER-JAyhFJRzLriH90OH1q8bOaBs3AYfWVXdsaZgs2JXsP3HbsW-YL_ikR-4RbKgVf6kSxGCxwktCl5nVECz4MJd8z1I0Z_OTvI6UsIDT4uCiJ2G3MXy-hNMyKcLuDfvf-frD0ugfk8?type=png|width=1111,height=316!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNpVkMtOwzAQRX_F8rr5gSyQmscCCSREYUPMYrCHxIof0dhGVFX_HTsJoO7O-Hiur3zh0ivkNR8Jlok9PAvHWEgf2_hCoJ12I3v0KhkMRTJ2HE6zNqZqIKBibSLSMplk3zfdDPcuIoGM-gtZ_40kdcCw23ZovbXJ6Xhm7QTGoBt3iU4Jd_P-a0Bif2nebRHd8ER-JAyhFJRzLriH90OH1q8bOaBs3AYfWVXdsaZgs2JXsP3HbsW-YL_ikR-4RbKgVf6kSxGCxwktCl5nVECz4MJd8z1I0Z_OTvI6UsIDT4uCiJ2G3MXy-hNMyKcLuDfvf-frD0ugfk8)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNpVkMtOwzAQRX_F8rr5gSyQmscCCSREYUPMYrCHxIof0dhGVFX_HTsJoO7O-Hiur3zh0ivkNR8Jlok9PAvHWEgf2_hCoJ12I3v0KhkMRTJ2HE6zNqZqIKBibSLSMplk3zfdDPcuIoGM-gtZ_40kdcCw23ZovbXJ6Xhm7QTGoBt3iU4Jd_P-a0Bif2nebRHd8ER-JAyhFJRzLriH90OH1q8bOaBs3AYfWVXdsaZgs2JXsP3HbsW-YL_ikR-4RbKgVf6kSxGCxwktCl5nVECz4MJd8z1I0Z_OTvI6UsIDT4uCiJ2G3MXy-hNMyKcLuDfvf-frD0ugfk8)|smart-link]
