Replay API REPL-13

EPIC: [Extras] UX Tailoring - Personalization

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:47 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Enhance the user experience on [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] by refining the interface, adding personalization features, and streamlining the user journey to maximize engagement and satisfaction.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Interface Refinement and User Testing:*
#* Conduct thorough user testing and gather feedback on the current interface.
#* Identify pain points, areas for improvement, and usability issues.
#* Iterate on the UI/UX design based on user feedback and best practices.
#* Implement design changes to improve navigation, streamline workflows, and enhance visual appeal.
# *Personalized Recommendations:*
#* Leverage machine learning algorithms to provide personalized recommendations for:
#** Training drills and exercises tailored to individual weaknesses.
#** Pro player matches or demos to study based on playstyle and preferences.
#** Specific strategies and tactics to improve performance in certain situations.
#* Track user progress and adjust recommendations accordingly to ensure continued growth and development.
# *Customizable Dashboards and Reports:*
#* Allow users to customize their dashboards with the stats and visualizations they find most valuable.
#* Offer a variety of pre-built report templates for different purposes (e.g., overall performance, specific skills,comparison with others).
#* Enable users to create custom reports based on their chosen metrics and filters.
#* Provide options to export reports in various formats (e.g., PDF, CSV) for sharing or further analysis.
# *Gamification and Achievement Systems:*
#* Implement gamification elements to motivate and reward user engagement, such as:
#** Badges and achievements for reaching milestones or completing challenges.
#** Leaderboards to foster competition and encourage improvement.
#** Progress tracking and leveling up systems to visualize personal growth.
#* Design a reward system that offers tangible benefits (e.g., discounts, exclusive content) to top performers or active community members.
# *Accessibility and Inclusivity:*
#* Ensure the platform adheres to accessibility standards (e.g., WCAG) to accommodate users with disabilities.
#* Provide options for adjusting font sizes, color contrast, and other visual elements.
#* Implement keyboard navigation and screen reader compatibility.
#* Regularly test for accessibility issues and make necessary adjustments.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Improved User Satisfaction:* Users report higher satisfaction with the platform's usability, navigation, and overall experience.
* *Increased Engagement:* Users spend more time on the platform and return more frequently due to personalized features and gamification elements.
* *Actionable Feedback:* User feedback is consistently gathered and incorporated into the design and development process.
* *Accessible Design:* The platform is accessible to users with disabilities, adhering to established guidelines and standards.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *User Research and Testing:* Invest in user research and testing methodologies to gather meaningful feedback and insights.
* *UI/UX Design:* Employ experienced UI/UX designers to create intuitive and visually appealing interfaces.
* *Personalization Algorithms:* Develop and refine machine learning algorithms for personalized recommendations.
* *Accessibility Tools and Testing:* Utilize accessibility testing tools and frameworks to ensure compliance.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*


!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNo1kMtuwyAQRX8FsU76AV5U8ktRpUqN3F1NF2MYxygGLB6LJMq_d6DO7sw9A-jy4NIp5BW_eNgW9jkIy1hI0z4ixpMHo-3l7Tx8ZcdYPX7YiH4GiWzAWVs0aOPvv2zGM_rgLKz6joq8dIa0gqidDftSO7YpRGf0HaYVWQdhmRx49fLdeKI3Zy3LqT3sx1pKDEFPetXxVlK6WNgMNTse31mTsSnYZmwLdhm7gn3GvmDND9ygN6AVtX9kIXhcqIvgFaECfxVc2CftQYru-2Ylr6JPeOBpoz7YaaBfMryaYQ2UbmB_nHvNzz-d3HCC?type=png|width=66.66666666666666%!

Replay API REPL-12

EPIC: Partnerships Platform Expansion

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:44 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Expand the reach and impact of [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] by exploring new platform integrations, strategic partnerships, and additional features that cater to a broader audience of gamers and esports enthusiasts.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Cross-Platform Integration:*
#* Integrate [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] with popular gaming platforms and launchers (e.g., Steam, Epic Games Store,[http://Battle.net|http://Battle.net|smart-link] ).
#* Enable automatic demo file detection and uploading directly from these platforms.
#* Explore options for in-game overlays or integrations to provide real-time insights and recommendations during gameplay.
# *Esports Organization Partnerships:*
#* Establish partnerships with professional esports organizations and teams.
#* Offer customized analysis and training solutions tailored to their specific needs.
#* Co-create content and educational resources to promote the platform and esports education.
#* Explore opportunities for sponsorship and co-branding.
# *Tournament and Event Integration:*
#* Partner with tournament organizers and platforms to provide official replay analysis and statistics for major events.
#* Integrate with live-streaming platforms (e.g., Twitch, YouTube) to offer real-time analysis and insights during broadcasts.
#* Create features to allow users to analyze and learn from professional matches.
# *Educational Content and Resources:*
#* Develop a comprehensive library of educational content, including:
#** Video tutorials and guides on game mechanics, strategies, and analysis techniques.
#** Articles and blog posts covering esports trends, news, and interviews with professional players.
#** Webinars and workshops with expert analysts and coaches.
#* Offer personalized learning paths and curricula based on user skill levels and goals.
# *Community Building and Engagement:*
#* Organize online and offline events, tournaments, and challenges to foster community engagement.
#* Encourage user-generated content creation and sharing through forums, social media, and content platforms.
#* Reward active community members with exclusive perks, badges, or recognition.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Increased Reach:* The platform reaches a wider audience of gamers and esports enthusiasts.
* *Strong Partnerships:* Strategic partnerships with key players in the esports industry are established and maintained.
* *Enhanced User Engagement:* Users actively participate in community activities and consume educational content.
* *Brand Recognition:* [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] becomes a recognized and trusted brand within the esports community.
* *Revenue Growth:* New revenue streams are generated through partnerships, sponsorships, and content monetization.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Platform APIs:* Research and integrate with APIs of relevant gaming platforms, launchers, and tournament organizers.
* *Data Sharing and Security:* Ensure secure and controlled data sharing between [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] and partner platforms.
* *Content Management System:* Implement a CMS or similar system to manage and deliver educational content effectively.
* *Community Platform:* Enhance the existing community platform or integrate with third-party solutions for events ,forums, and user-generated content.

*Visual Representation (Mermaid Diagram):*


!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNpNkM9qwzAMh1_F-NzuAXIY5B9jMGjoemq8gxarjVksB1s-lNJ3n-2lsNsnfT-BpLucnEZZyauHdRYfR0VChPi9lYj85sEaur4Mx0N2QtTjsABfnLfinRhTko2j8PVnm7EPq_McxACeCX2YzfqU7Xhy0RNYJP4_vOlu7HWcSgcW0boUIN5cP7bO2kiGb6KJZtFpp6KQtKIMtdjvX0WTsSnYZmwLdhm7gn3GvmAtd9Kit2B0-sA9CyV5RotKVgk1-B8lFT1SDiK7zxtNsmIfcSfjqoGxM5BOsLK6wBJSdwU6O_esH7-3YXIj?type=png|width=340,height=436!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNpNkM9qwzAMh1_F-NzuAXIY5B9jMGjoemq8gxarjVksB1s-lNJ3n-2lsNsnfT-BpLucnEZZyauHdRYfR0VChPi9lYj85sEaur4Mx0N2QtTjsABfnLfinRhTko2j8PVnm7EPq_McxACeCX2YzfqU7Xhy0RNYJP4_vOlu7HWcSgcW0boUIN5cP7bO2kiGb6KJZtFpp6KQtKIMtdjvX0WTsSnYZmwLdhm7gn3GvmAtd9Kit2B0-sA9CyV5RotKVgk1-B8lFT1SDiK7zxtNsmIfcSfjqoGxM5BOsLK6wBJSdwU6O_esH7-3YXIj)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNpNkM9qwzAMh1_F-NzuAXIY5B9jMGjoemq8gxarjVksB1s-lNJ3n-2lsNsnfT-BpLucnEZZyauHdRYfR0VChPi9lYj85sEaur4Mx0N2QtTjsABfnLfinRhTko2j8PVnm7EPq_McxACeCX2YzfqU7Xhy0RNYJP4_vOlu7HWcSgcW0boUIN5cP7bO2kiGb6KJZtFpp6KQtKIMtdjvX0WTsSnYZmwLdhm7gn3GvmAtd9Kit2B0-sA9CyV5RotKVgk1-B8lFT1SDiK7zxtNsmIfcSfjqoGxM5BOsLK6wBJSdwU6O_esH7-3YXIj)|smart-link]

Replay API REPL-11

EPIC: Advanced Analytics and Insights

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:42 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Enhance [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO]'s analysis engine to provide deeper, more actionable insights into gameplay, leveraging advanced statistics, machine learning, and data visualization techniques.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *In-Depth Statistical Analysis:*
#* Expand the range of player and team statistics tracked and analyzed.
#* Incorporate advanced metrics like:
#** Opening duel win rates and impact
#** Grenade effectiveness (flashes, smokes, HE nades)
#** Buy patterns and economic analysis
#** Utility damage and effectiveness
#** Advanced movement and positioning metrics (e.g., distance traveled, crouch usage)
#* Segment statistics by map, side (T/CT), and weapon type for granular insights.
# *Predictive Analytics with Machine Learning:*
#* Integrate machine learning models to predict:
#** Round outcomes based on player actions and game state.
#** Potential future actions of opponents based on their tendencies.
#** Optimal economic decisions in various scenarios.
#* Personalize predictions and recommendations based on individual player profiles and playstyles.
# *Trend Analysis and Pattern Recognition:*
#* Analyze trends in player and team performance over time to identify areas of improvement and potential weaknesses.
#* Use pattern recognition algorithms to detect common mistakes or successful strategies employed by players and teams.
#* Highlight recurring patterns in decision-making and offer suggestions for optimization.
# *Comparative Analysis and Benchmarking:*
#* Allow users to compare their stats and performance with:
#** Other players in their skill bracket or rank.
#** Professional players and teams.
#** Historical performance data for themselves or their team.
#* Provide benchmarks and reference points for players to gauge their progress and identify areas for improvement.
# *Enhanced Visualization and Reporting:*
#* Develop new and innovative ways to visualize complex data and insights.
#* Create customizable reports and dashboards that allow users to focus on the metrics most relevant to them.
#* Implement interactive visualizations that enable users to explore data in depth and uncover hidden patterns.
#* Introduce video highlights or "heatmaps" that visually showcase key moments and critical decisions.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Deeper Insights:* The platform provides users with a more comprehensive understanding of their gameplay and areas for improvement.
* *Actionable Recommendations:* The analysis offers clear, specific, and actionable suggestions for players to enhance their skills and decision-making.
* *Data-Driven Decisions:* Players can make informed decisions about their strategies and tactics based on the provided data and insights.
* *Engaging Visualizations:* Visualizations are compelling, interactive, and effectively communicate complex information.
* *Competitive Edge:* Users feel that the advanced analytics give them a competitive advantage over other players.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Data Science and Machine Learning Expertise:* Invest in data science expertise to develop and implement advanced statistical models and machine learning algorithms.
* *Data Pipelines:* Build robust data pipelines to collect, process, and analyze large volumes of demo data efficiently.
* *Visualization Libraries:* Leverage powerful visualization libraries (e.g., D3.js, Plotly, Three.js) to create interactive and informative visualizations.
* *Performance Optimization:* Ensure that the analysis and visualization processes are optimized for speed and scalability to handle increased user demand.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*

!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNqNkt1Kw0AQhV9l2AuvGh8gF0JtWilUlFa8cJOLsTs2i9kf9keope_uJsVAG6y52xnOOZxv2APbGkEsZzuHtobVutQAPr6fxgIDwlLbGNo1wJQXpAwsZENwK0hVkGV3cM-nGpu9lx7meic1Va2atDjLutCcAofWLnHGlzoryIYaNgGDr66qC_64gmdHQm6DNPof9Zy_uNSt73NdveAzoyw6DPKLzj2XgE8x9IcaAHRhD_xV-oiN_MauKNzAmqxxPeCAZJxtgDTO9gfbGHPHziZMkVMoRfo_h3ZdslCTopLl6SnQfZas1MekwxjMZq-3LA8u0oRFKzBQITGdTrH8Axufthb1mzG_8_EHcGXhSg?type=png|width=922,height=372!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNqNkt1Kw0AQhV9l2AuvGh8gF0JtWilUlFa8cJOLsTs2i9kf9keope_uJsVAG6y52xnOOZxv2APbGkEsZzuHtobVutQAPr6fxgIDwlLbGNo1wJQXpAwsZENwK0hVkGV3cM-nGpu9lx7meic1Va2atDjLutCcAofWLnHGlzoryIYaNgGDr66qC_64gmdHQm6DNPof9Zy_uNSt73NdveAzoyw6DPKLzj2XgE8x9IcaAHRhD_xV-oiN_MauKNzAmqxxPeCAZJxtgDTO9gfbGHPHziZMkVMoRfo_h3ZdslCTopLl6SnQfZas1MekwxjMZq-3LA8u0oRFKzBQITGdTrH8Axufthb1mzG_8_EHcGXhSg)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNqNkt1Kw0AQhV9l2AuvGh8gF0JtWilUlFa8cJOLsTs2i9kf9keope_uJsVAG6y52xnOOZxv2APbGkEsZzuHtobVutQAPr6fxgIDwlLbGNo1wJQXpAwsZENwK0hVkGV3cM-nGpu9lx7meic1Va2atDjLutCcAofWLnHGlzoryIYaNgGDr66qC_64gmdHQm6DNPof9Zy_uNSt73NdveAzoyw6DPKLzj2XgE8x9IcaAHRhD_xV-oiN_MauKNzAmqxxPeCAZJxtgDTO9gfbGHPHziZMkVMoRfo_h3ZdslCTopLl6SnQfZas1MekwxjMZq-3LA8u0oRFKzBQITGdTrH8Axufthb1mzG_8_EHcGXhSg)|smart-link]

{noformat}graph LR
subgraph Data Input
A[Demo File (.dem)] --> B[Analysis Engine]
end
subgraph Analysis Engine
B[Analysis Engine] --> C[In-Depth Stats]
B[Analysis Engine] --> D[ML Predictions]
B[Analysis Engine] --> E[Trend Analysis]
B[Analysis Engine] --> F[Comparative Analysis]
end
subgraph Output
C[In-Depth Stats] --> G[Visualizations & Reports]
D[ML Predictions] --> G[Visualizations & Reports]
E[Trend Analysis] --> G[Visualizations & Reports]
F[Comparative Analysis] --> G[Visualizations & Reports]
end

Replay API REPL-10

EPIC: Mobile App Development

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:38 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Design and develop a mobile app for iOS and Android devices that complements the [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] web platform, providing users with convenient access to replay analysis, insights, and community features on the go.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *User Interface Design:*
#* Create a mobile-first UI design that is intuitive, visually appealing, and optimized for touchscreens.
#* Adapt the core features and functionality of the web platform to the mobile environment.
#* Prioritize essential features for the initial release (e.g., demo upload, basic stats, key moments).
# *Demo Upload and Management:*
#* Enable users to easily upload demo files from their mobile devices (e.g., through file sharing apps, cloud storage).
#* Allow users to manage and organize their uploaded demos within the app.
#* Provide options to view analysis summaries and basic stats directly on their mobile devices.
# *Key Insights and Recommendations:*
#* Display personalized stats, progress tracking, and key insights in a mobile-friendly format.
#* Deliver concise and actionable recommendations for improvement tailored to mobile users.
#* Implement push notifications to alert users about new analysis results or personalized tips.
# *Community Interaction:*
#* Integrate core community features like forums, messaging, and profile viewing into the mobile app.
#* Enable users to participate in discussions, connect with other players, and share insights on the go.
#* Implement social sharing features for users to share their achievements or interesting findings on other platforms.
# *Performance Optimization:*
#* Ensure the app is fast, responsive, and optimized for various mobile devices and network conditions.
#* Implement caching mechanisms to reduce data usage and improve the offline experience.
#* Monitor app performance and address any bottlenecks or issues promptly.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Intuitive UI/UX:* The mobile app is easy to use, navigate, and provides a seamless experience on both iOS and Android devices.
* *Seamless Integration:* The app works seamlessly with the web platform, allowing users to switch between devices without losing data or progress.
* *Engaging Experience:* The app provides a compelling and engaging experience that keeps users coming back for more.
* *Performance:* The app is fast, responsive, and optimized for mobile devices.
* *Positive Reviews:* The app receives positive reviews and ratings in the app stores.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Mobile Development Framework:* Choose a suitable cross-platform framework (e.g., React Native, Flutter) or native development (Swift for iOS, Kotlin for Android).
* *API Integration:* Ensure smooth integration with the Replay API for data exchange and synchronization.
* *Push Notification Service:* Select a push notification service (e.g., Firebase Cloud Messaging, Apple Push Notification service) for user engagement.
* *App Store Optimization (ASO):* Optimize the app listing and keywords to increase visibility in app stores.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*


!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNp9kEFrwzAMhf-K0CmF9g_kMMiaDQoblJZeFvegxGpjFlvGcQ6h9L_PaTe2bnQ36fHex5NO2IhmzPEYyLfwslEOoB_q6_oqtekYCu8nGaCodj0HWLnI4UAN72GxeIDHqlivLmJKRSNuP7nZaeVuaL9cV-Tf8IW5rDbsOxqn0DfuB-y2yJ16iVRmJVuBne-E9Oy-7ykrqW9rofCf6zlbirWDM3GcfbbCOVoOloxOXzxNosLYsmWFeRo1hXeFyp2Tj4Yo29E1mMcw8BwHrylyaSidZDE_UNcn1ZN7E_nazx8o6YsL?type=png|width=569,height=446!

Replay API REPL-9

EPIC: Additional Game Support [Expansion/Vertical Rollout]

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:33 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Expand the [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] platform to support replay analysis and performance enhancement features for a wider range of popular esports titles, broadening its appeal and user base.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Game Selection and Prioritization:*
#* Research and identify the most popular and relevant esports titles for integration (e.g., Valorant, League of Legends, Dota 2, Overwatch 2, Rocket League).
#* Prioritize games based on user demand, market potential, and technical feasibility.
#* Create a roadmap for game integration, outlining timelines and resource allocation.
# *Demo File Parsing and Data Extraction:*
#* Develop parsers or adapt existing ones to extract relevant game data from demo files of each supported title.
#* Define data models to store and organize the unique information specific to each game (e.g., hero/champion stats, objective interactions, ability usage).
# *Game-Specific Analysis and Algorithms:*
#* Design and implement analysis algorithms tailored to the unique mechanics and features of each game.
#* Calculate relevant player and team statistics specific to each title (e.g., KDA in League of Legends, GPM in Dota 2, goals scored in Rocket League).
#* Identify key moments and events unique to each game (e.g., ultimate abilities in Overwatch, map control in Valorant).
# *User Interface Adaptation:*
#* Update the user interface (UI) to accommodate different game selections.
#* Customize the dashboard, visualizations, and reports to display relevant stats and insights for each game.
#* Ensure a consistent user experience across all supported titles, while highlighting unique features of each game.
# *Machine Learning Models (Optional):*
#* Explore the integration of machine learning models specific to each game to provide more personalized and accurate insights.
#* Train models on relevant data sets for each title to offer tailored recommendations and predictions.
#* Consider utilizing game-specific APIs or data sources to enhance analysis capabilities.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Successful Integration:* The platform can successfully parse and analyze demo files for all targeted esports titles.
* *Accurate Analysis:* Game-specific statistics and insights are calculated accurately and presented in a clear and understandable way.
* *User-Friendly Interface:* The UI adapts seamlessly to different games, providing a consistent and intuitive experience.
* *Valuable Insights:* The platform delivers valuable insights and recommendations that are relevant to the specific game being analyzed.
* *Positive User Feedback:* Users find the analysis and features helpful for improving their performance in their chosen game.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Parser Development:* Research existing libraries or develop custom parsers for each game's demo file format.
* *Data Modeling:* Design flexible data models to accommodate the unique data structures of different games.
* *Game-Specific Algorithms:* Develop and refine algorithms that capture the nuances of each game's mechanics and strategic elements.
* *UI Customization:* Ensure the frontend framework and component library can easily support game-specific UI customizations.
* *Scalability:* Design the architecture to easily accommodate the addition of new games in the future.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*


!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNqNkM1qAjEQx19lmLPbB8ihsHWLFBTFxUs3HqabUUPzRZI9iPjuzab2Uij0Nv-PH8PMDUevGAWeI4ULrPfSAaTp4yGZ8yqS1e78tNtv5wygHVZkGXo2PGbt3RGa5hleho6thx3FVNrH7-ovsxaXFW_6wKM-6RFaR-aadHogf8YV7obDG7SKQqa6-j_M67BZw6ZcaZKAbZg5MpVkp3CBlqMlrcoPbrMpMV_YskRRRkXxU6J099KjKfv-6kYUOU68wCkoytxpKr-yKE5kUnEDuXfvf_T9C8e3dOU?type=png|width=429,height=352!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNqNkM1qAjEQx19lmLPbB8ihsHWLFBTFxUs3HqabUUPzRZI9iPjuzab2Uij0Nv-PH8PMDUevGAWeI4ULrPfSAaTp4yGZ8yqS1e78tNtv5wygHVZkGXo2PGbt3RGa5hleho6thx3FVNrH7-ovsxaXFW_6wKM-6RFaR-aadHogf8YV7obDG7SKQqa6-j_M67BZw6ZcaZKAbZg5MpVkp3CBlqMlrcoPbrMpMV_YskRRRkXxU6J099KjKfv-6kYUOU68wCkoytxpKr-yKE5kUnEDuXfvf_T9C8e3dOU)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNqNkM1qAjEQx19lmLPbB8ihsHWLFBTFxUs3HqabUUPzRZI9iPjuzab2Uij0Nv-PH8PMDUevGAWeI4ULrPfSAaTp4yGZ8yqS1e78tNtv5wygHVZkGXo2PGbt3RGa5hleho6thx3FVNrH7-ovsxaXFW_6wKM-6RFaR-aadHogf8YV7obDG7SKQqa6-j_M67BZw6ZcaZKAbZg5MpVkp3CBlqMlrcoPbrMpMV_YskRRRkXxU6J099KjKfv-6kYUOU68wCkoytxpKr-yKE5kUnEDuXfvf_T9C8e3dOU)|smart-link]

{noformat}graph LR
subgraph LeetGraming.PRO
A[Game Selection] --> B[Demo Parsing]
B[Demo Parsing] --> C[Game-Specific Analysis]
C[Game-Specific Analysis] --> D[UI Adaptation]
C[Game-Specific Analysis] --> E[ML Models: Optional]
end
{noformat}

*Explanation of Diagram:*

* *Game Selection:* The user selects the game they want to analyze.
* *Demo Parsing:* The platform parses the demo file based on the selected game.
* *Game-Specific Analysis:* The analysis engine applies algorithms tailored to the selected game.
* *UI Adaptation:* The UI dynamically adjusts to display relevant stats and visualizations for the chosen game.
* *ML Models (Optional):* Machine learning models can be integrated to provide further insights and recommendations specific to the game. 		21/mai/24 1:33 PM Em andamento purple

Replay API REPL-8

EPIC: Monetization Strategies

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:29 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Explore and implement various monetization strategies to generate revenue and ensure the long-term sustainability of the [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] platform.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Subscription Model:*
#* Design and implement a tiered subscription model with different pricing plans and features.
#* Offer a free tier with limited access to basic features to attract users.
#* Provide premium tiers with advanced features like:
#** Deeper analysis and insights
#** Personalized coaching and training plans
#** Access to exclusive content (pro player guides, tutorials)
#** Priority demo processing and support
#* Experiment with different pricing models and subscription lengths (e.g., monthly, quarterly, annually).
# *In-App Purchases:*
#* Identify potential in-app purchases that provide additional value to users.
#* Offer options for purchasing:
#** Detailed reports or analysis summaries for specific matches.
#** One-on-one coaching sessions with professional players or analysts.
#** Cosmetic items for user profiles or avatars.
#** Access to premium tournaments or leagues.
#* Ensure that in-app purchases enhance the user experience without creating a "pay-to-win" environment.
# *Advertising and Sponsorships:*
#* Explore partnerships with brands and sponsors relevant to the gaming community.
#* Integrate non-intrusive advertising (e.g., banner ads, sponsored content) into the platform.
#* Consider offering premium ad-free subscriptions.
#* Leverage sponsorships for exclusive events, tournaments, or content.
# *Affiliate Marketing:*
#* Partner with gaming hardware companies, software providers, or esports organizations.
#* Promote their products or services through affiliate links on the platform.
#* Earn a commission on sales generated through these referrals.
# *Data Licensing:*
#* Anonymize and aggregate user data to generate valuable insights about gameplay trends, player behavior, and team strategies.
#* Offer this data to esports teams, analysts, or research organizations for a fee.
#* Ensure strict privacy measures and compliance with data protection regulations.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Revenue Generation:* Implement monetization strategies that generate consistent revenue and contribute to the platform's sustainability.
* *User Satisfaction:* Ensure monetization efforts do not negatively impact the user experience or create a sense of unfairness.
* *Value Proposition:* Clearly communicate the value of premium features and in-app purchases to encourage user adoption.
* *Ethical Considerations:* Adhere to ethical practices and avoid predatory monetization tactics.
* *Legal Compliance:* Ensure compliance with relevant laws and regulations regarding in-app purchases, advertising, and data privacy.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Payment Gateway Integration:* Integrate with secure payment gateways (e.g., Stripe, PayPal) to handle transactions.
* *Subscription Management:* Implement a system to manage subscriptions, renewals, and cancellations.
* *Analytics:* Track user spending patterns and conversion rates to optimize monetization strategies.
* *Legal and Privacy:* Consult with legal experts to ensure compliance with relevant laws and regulations.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*

!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNpdkN1qwzAMhV_F6LrpA-Ri4DZlDDpW0rvFu1BtpTGrFeOfQil99zks-yF353xHEpLuoEdDUMM5oB_EvlUsRMyn2RKl54DO8nl9aN-mTAjZHfMp6mB9siN_fMNN98KV9F4cctADRopzsO2kuVJINpYhM2s62ff2YjGReMXwSekv23UNJhR7q4l_W4iN4klIUVVPoqUrcaYJbJZguwTNEuz-A1iBo-DQmvKD-xQrSAM5UlAXacp2ChQ_Sh3mNB5vrKFOIdMKsjflgMZi-ZWDusdLLNQjv4_jj398AXT2czQ?type=png|width=340,height=456!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNpdkN1qwzAMhV_F6LrpA-Ri4DZlDDpW0rvFu1BtpTGrFeOfQil99zks-yF353xHEpLuoEdDUMM5oB_EvlUsRMyn2RKl54DO8nl9aN-mTAjZHfMp6mB9siN_fMNN98KV9F4cctADRopzsO2kuVJINpYhM2s62ff2YjGReMXwSekv23UNJhR7q4l_W4iN4klIUVVPoqUrcaYJbJZguwTNEuz-A1iBo-DQmvKD-xQrSAM5UlAXacp2ChQ_Sh3mNB5vrKFOIdMKsjflgMZi-ZWDusdLLNQjv4_jj398AXT2czQ)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNpdkN1qwzAMhV_F6LrpA-Ri4DZlDDpW0rvFu1BtpTGrFeOfQil99zks-yF353xHEpLuoEdDUMM5oB_EvlUsRMyn2RKl54DO8nl9aN-mTAjZHfMp6mB9siN_fMNN98KV9F4cctADRopzsO2kuVJINpYhM2s62ff2YjGReMXwSekv23UNJhR7q4l_W4iN4klIUVVPoqUrcaYJbJZguwTNEuz-A1iBo-DQmvKD-xQrSAM5UlAXacp2ChQ_Sh3mNB5vrKFOIdMKsjflgMZi-ZWDusdLLNQjv4_jj398AXT2czQ)|smart-link]

Replay API REPL-7

EPIC: Esports Team Integration

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:26 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Develop features and tools to facilitate the integration of [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] into the workflows of professional esports teams, enabling coaches and analysts to leverage the platform's insights for training, strategy development, and performance improvement.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Team Management:*
#* Create a dedicated team management interface within [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO].
#* Allow team owners or managers to invite players, coaches, and analysts to join the team.
#* Define roles and permissions for different team members (e.g., view-only, analysis, upload).
#* Facilitate communication and collaboration within the team (e.g., shared notes, discussions).
# *Centralized Demo Repository:*
#* Provide a secure and organized space for teams to store and manage their demo files.
#* Enable coaches and analysts to easily access and analyze demos from all team members.
#* Allow for the categorization and tagging of demos for efficient searching and filtering.
#* Implement version control to track changes and compare different versions of the same demo.
# *Team-Specific Analysis:*
#* Develop specialized analysis tools tailored for team performance evaluation:
#** Compare individual player stats across different matches or opponents.
#** Analyze team communication and coordination patterns.
#** Identify team-wide strengths and weaknesses.
#* Generate reports and summaries for coaches and analysts to use in their strategic planning.
# *Scrimmage and Match Analysis:*
#* Integrate with popular tournament platforms or APIs (e.g., FACEIT, ESEA) to automatically import and analyze scrimmages and official matches.
#* Provide in-depth analysis of team performance in competitive settings.
#* Identify trends, patterns, and areas for improvement specific to tournament play.
# *API Access and Integration:*
#* Offer a comprehensive API for teams to programmatically access and integrate [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] data into their existing tools and workflows.
#* Enable the development of custom dashboards, reports, and integrations with other esports analytics platforms.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Team Adoption:* Professional esports teams find value in the platform and actively use it for their training and analysis.
* *Streamlined Workflows:* [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] seamlessly integrates into existing team workflows, enhancing efficiency and collaboration.
* *Actionable Insights:* The platform provides teams with clear and actionable insights that lead to measurable performance improvements.
* *Secure Data Management:* Team data is securely stored and managed, with appropriate access controls for different team members.
* *Flexible API:* The API is well-documented, easy to use, and allows for customization and integration with other tools.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Team Management System:* Design a robust system for team creation, invitations, roles, and permissions.
* *Data Storage:* Implement a secure and scalable storage solution for team-specific demo files and analysis results.
* *API Design:* Develop a well-structured and comprehensive API with clear documentation.
* *Security:* Prioritize security measures to protect sensitive team data and prevent unauthorized access.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*

!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNpVkE1OxDAMha8SecFqygG6QOrPCCGBGLWsqFmYxNNGNE6VposymruTiWDB7nv285PtC2hvGEoYAy2Teu5Q1u3zVzDHx0DOynh_6l5RlKqGNyanXkhoZMcSP27VemgSBprtNxvVsvOq48WvNvqwZ0eT54p-YW3PVqtKaN5Xu-ZmO_Q6WOdSpLpL2VFP_w3HoTo9JWIxKCiVKooHVaPUGRqUJkOL0mY4ohwzVHAAx8GRNenEyy0LIU5pc4QyoaHwhYByTT7aou930VDGsPEBtsVQ5NZSeoaD8kzzmqoLybv3f_r6A1lJafE?type=png|width=50%!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNpVkE1OxDAMha8SecFqygG6QOrPCCGBGLWsqFmYxNNGNE6VposymruTiWDB7nv285PtC2hvGEoYAy2Teu5Q1u3zVzDHx0DOynh_6l5RlKqGNyanXkhoZMcSP27VemgSBprtNxvVsvOq48WvNvqwZ0eT54p-YW3PVqtKaN5Xu-ZmO_Q6WOdSpLpL2VFP_w3HoTo9JWIxKCiVKooHVaPUGRqUJkOL0mY4ohwzVHAAx8GRNenEyy0LIU5pc4QyoaHwhYByTT7aou930VDGsPEBtsVQ5NZSeoaD8kzzmqoLybv3f_r6A1lJafE)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNpVkE1OxDAMha8SecFqygG6QOrPCCGBGLWsqFmYxNNGNE6VposymruTiWDB7nv285PtC2hvGEoYAy2Teu5Q1u3zVzDHx0DOynh_6l5RlKqGNyanXkhoZMcSP27VemgSBprtNxvVsvOq48WvNvqwZ0eT54p-YW3PVqtKaN5Xu-ZmO_Q6WOdSpLpL2VFP_w3HoTo9JWIxKCiVKooHVaPUGRqUJkOL0mY4ohwzVHAAx8GRNenEyy0LIU5pc4QyoaHwhYByTT7aou930VDGsPEBtsVQ5NZSeoaD8kzzmqoLybv3f_r6A1lJafE)|smart-link]

{noformat}graph LR
subgraph LeetGraming.PRO
A[Team Management]
B[Centralized Demo Repository]
C[Team-Specific Analysis]
D[Scrimmage & Match Analysis]
E[API]
end

A --> B
B --> C
C --> D
D --> E
E --> A
{noformat} 		21/mai/24 1:26 PM Em andamento purple
0|i0001b: Nenhum
Replay API REPL-6

EPIC: Community Features

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:23 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Develop and implement community features that encourage interaction, collaboration, and learning among [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] users, creating a thriving ecosystem for players to connect, share insights, and improve together.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Forums and Discussion Boards:*
#* Create dedicated forums or discussion boards for users to:
#** Share tips, strategies, and analysis of matches.
#** Discuss specific game mechanics, maps, or agents.
#** Ask for help and feedback from other players.
#** Participate in general discussions about eSports and gaming.
#* Categorize forums by game, skill level, or topic for better organization.
#* Moderate discussions to ensure a positive and constructive environment.
# *User Profiles and Social Interaction:*
#* Enhance user profiles to showcase:
#** Preferred games and skill levels.
#** Favorite teams or players.
#** Achievements and progress within the platform.
#* Allow users to follow each other, share replays, and comment on each other's analysis.
#* Implement a messaging system for direct communication between users.
#* Encourage friendly competition through leaderboards and challenges.
# *Teams and Clans:*
#* Enable users to create or join teams/clans within the platform.
#* Facilitate team-based analysis, strategy sharing, and collaborative improvement.
#* Allow teams to compete against each other in organized tournaments or scrimmages.
#* Provide tools for team management (e.g., roster management, role assignments).
# *Content Creation and Sharing:*
#* Empower users to create and share their own content, such as:
#** Guides and tutorials on specific aspects of the game.
#** Video breakdowns of replays with expert commentary.
#** Blog posts discussing esports trends and strategies.
#* Implement a rating and commenting system for user-generated content.
#* Feature outstanding content prominently on the platform to encourage community engagement.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Active Engagement:* Users actively participate in forums, discussions, and other community activities.
* *Positive Environment:* The community fosters a welcoming and supportive atmosphere for players of all skill levels.
* *Collaboration:* Users collaborate effectively through teams, sharing insights and helping each other improve.
* *Content Creation:* Users generate high-quality content that adds value to the community.
* *Platform Growth:* The community features contribute to increased user retention and acquisition.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Community Platform:* Choose a suitable platform or build custom components for forums, messaging, and profile features.
* *Moderation Tools:* Implement robust moderation tools to ensure a safe and inclusive community environment.
* *Gamification:* Consider incorporating gamification elements (e.g., badges, achievements) to incentivize participation and content creation.
* *Content Management System:* If user-generated content is a significant focus, consider integrating a CMS for easier content creation and organization.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*

Replay API REPL-5

EPIC: Scalability and Performance

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:20 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Ensure the [LeetGraming.PRO|http://LeetGraming.PRO] platform can handle a large number of concurrent users, process high volumes of demo data efficiently, and deliver analysis results with minimal latency.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Load Testing:*
#* Conduct comprehensive load testing to simulate various user scenarios and traffic patterns.
#* Identify performance bottlenecks and areas for optimization under stress.
#* Establish baseline performance metrics (e.g., response times, throughput, resource utilization) and set performance goals.
# *Database Optimization:*
#* Design and implement a scalable database schema that can handle the increasing volume of demo files and analysis results.
#* Optimize database queries for faster data retrieval and reduce the load on the database server.
#* Employ indexing strategies and consider *sharding* (MongoDB) or *partitioning* (if together with Kafka) for large-scale datasets.
# *Caching Strategies:*
#* Implement caching mechanisms at multiple levels (e.g., in-memory, distributed caching) to improve response times and reduce the load on backend services.
#* Strategically cache frequently accessed data, such as player stats, match summaries, and visualization results.
#* Invalidate cache entries when data is updated to ensure consistency.
# *Cloud Infrastructure:*
#* Leverage cloud-based infrastructure (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) for scalability and flexibility.
#* Utilize auto-scaling to dynamically adjust resources based on demand.
#* Employ load balancing to distribute traffic across multiple servers for optimal performance.
#* Consider content delivery networks (CDNs) to speed up the delivery of static assets.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Performance Under Load:* The platform should maintain acceptable response times and throughput under heavy user loads.
* *Scalability:* The platform should be able to handle increasing volumes of demo files and users without significant degradation in performance.
* *Efficient Data Processing:* Demo file processing and analysis should be completed within a reasonable timeframe.
* *Optimal Resource Utilization:* The platform should utilize server resources efficiently to minimize costs.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Load Testing Tools:* Choose appropriate load testing tools (e.g., k6, Locust, JMeter) to simulate realistic user traffic.
* *Database Technologies:* Consider using databases designed for high performance and scalability (e.g.,PostgreSQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB).
* *Caching Solutions:* Evaluate caching solutions like Redis, Memcached, or cloud-based caching services.
* *Cloud Providers:* Select a cloud provider that aligns with your budget and technical requirements.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*

!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNqFkM9qwzAMh19F6Ny-QA6D_NnGIIex3mbnoNpaY5rYxnFWQum710m6Q7vBbtbnTz8knVE5zZjhIZBvof6QFmAY92tZdoZtnBFALtZqaGC7fYJC1I40FNSRVRyaWWKrpb0LKEgdFzonPLYsOaXI39_glSKfaGpW8Z4tWiVy7zujKBpnYcfhm8Nw0__-W9qeRUmqNfYANU23KeEXXdQXUVGkPQ38f-yDmzbEDfYcejI63fI8Q4mx5Z4lZumpKRwlSntJHo3R7SarMIth5A2OXqdNK0PpZD1mX9QNiXqyn8791JcrKziMFg?type=png|width=1000,height=156!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNqFkM9qwzAMh19F6Ny-QA6D_NnGIIex3mbnoNpaY5rYxnFWQum710m6Q7vBbtbnTz8knVE5zZjhIZBvof6QFmAY92tZdoZtnBFALtZqaGC7fYJC1I40FNSRVRyaWWKrpb0LKEgdFzonPLYsOaXI39_glSKfaGpW8Z4tWiVy7zujKBpnYcfhm8Nw0__-W9qeRUmqNfYANU23KeEXXdQXUVGkPQ38f-yDmzbEDfYcejI63fI8Q4mx5Z4lZumpKRwlSntJHo3R7SarMIth5A2OXqdNK0PpZD1mX9QNiXqyn8791JcrKziMFg)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNqFkM9qwzAMh19F6Ny-QA6D_NnGIIex3mbnoNpaY5rYxnFWQum710m6Q7vBbtbnTz8knVE5zZjhIZBvof6QFmAY92tZdoZtnBFALtZqaGC7fYJC1I40FNSRVRyaWWKrpb0LKEgdFzonPLYsOaXI39_glSKfaGpW8Z4tWiVy7zujKBpnYcfhm8Nw0__-W9qeRUmqNfYANU23KeEXXdQXUVGkPQ38f-yDmzbEDfYcejI63fI8Q4mx5Z4lZumpKRwlSntJHo3R7SarMIth5A2OXqdNK0PpZD1mX9QNiXqyn8791JcrKziMFg)|smart-link]

{noformat}graph LR
subgraph Client
A[Clients] --> B[Load Balancer]
end

subgraph Backend
B[Load Balancer] --> C[API Gateway]
C[API Gateway] --> D[Application Servers]
D[Application Servers] --> E[Caching Layer]
E[Caching Layer] --> F[Database]
D[Application Servers] --> F[Database]
end
{noformat}

*Explanation of Diagram:*

* *Clients:* Multiple users accessing the platform.
* *Load Balancer:* Distributes traffic across multiple application servers for better performance.
* *API Gateway:* Handles incoming requests and routes them to the appropriate backend services.
* *Application Servers:* Process requests, interact with the database, and generate responses.
* *Caching Layer:* Stores frequently accessed data to reduce the load on the database and improve response times.
* *Database:* Stores demo files, analysis results, and other persistent data. 		21/mai/24 1:20 PM Em andamento purple
0|i0000v: Nenhum
Replay API REPL-4

EPIC: User Interface & Frontend Integration

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:16 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Design and build a user-friendly and engaging frontend interface to seamlessly interact with the Replay API and present analysis results to users in an informative and visually appealing way.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Demo Upload:*
#* Create a clear and intuitive interface for users to upload their CS:GO/CS:2 demo files.
#* Support drag-and-drop, file selection, and potentially URL input for demo uploads.
#* Provide feedback during the upload process (progress bars, success/error messages).
#* Validate file types and sizes to ensure compatibility.
# *Dashboard:*
#* Design a personalized dashboard as the central hub for user interaction.
#* Display key player statistics (K/D ratio, ADR, HSP, etc.) in an easily digestible format.
#* Visualize progress tracking over time (e.g., skill rating, win/loss ratios).
#* Present actionable improvement recommendations based on analysis results.
#* Offer customizable widgets and layouts to cater to individual preferences.
# *Match Visualization:*
#* Implement interactive visualizations to showcase analysis results, including:
#** Heatmaps to display player positioning and movement.
#** Graphs to track stats over time, compare players, or visualize weapon usage.
#** Interactive timelines to pinpoint key events in matches.
#** 3D representations of maps with player trajectories (if feasible).
#* Ensure visualizations are responsive and adaptable to different screen sizes.
# *User Profile:*
#* Develop robust user profile features to manage demos, settings, and preferences.
#* Allow users to view and organize their uploaded demos.
#* Provide options to customize dashboard layout, preferred stats, and notification settings.
#* Enable users to track their progress, set goals, and share their achievements with the community.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Intuitiveness:* The user interface should be easy to understand and navigate, even for non-technical users.
* *Seamless Uploads:* Demo file uploads should be smooth, reliable, and provide clear feedback to the user.
* *Valuable Insights:* The dashboard should offer meaningful statistics, progress tracking, and personalized recommendations.
* *Interactive Visualizations:* Visualizations should be engaging, interactive, and provide deeper insights into gameplay.
* *Robust Profiles:* User profiles should offer essential functionality for managing demos and personalizing the experience.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Frontend Framework:* Choose a suitable framework (e.g., React, Vue.js, Angular) for building the UI.
* *UI Component Library:* Consider using a component library (e.g., NextUI, Material-UI) to accelerate development and ensure visual consistency.
* *API Integration:* Ensure seamless integration with the Replay API for fetching and displaying analysis results.
* *State Management:* Implement effective state management (e.g., Context API, Redux) to handle user interactions and data updates.
* *Visualization Libraries:* Select appropriate libraries (e.g., D3.js, Chart.js, [http://deck.gl|http://deck.gl|smart-link] ) for creating interactive visualizations.

*Visual Representation DRAF (Mermaid Diagram):*

!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNp9kE1LAzEQhv9KmNMW2j-wB6G6VgoKpVIPbnqYbmbdYL7Ix6GW_nezqaJV2lvm5XkfJnOAzgqCGt48uoE9rrlhLKTdaVx4ayIZMYaMzdtNIM-WOfI9drRls9kNu23nq2UJcydKa7YjXUpnrj_USfm_XJx37Zqcwv1Y-tH9kp0vcmG9bGqqhrRlG6csisll7r5qMAw7i_4ataieMHYDe5EhoZIfZeMr_ENVspW3vVQ0-foITEGT1yhFPvthDDnEgTRxqPNToH_nwM0xc5iifd6bDuroE00hOYGRGon5ChrqHlXIqUPzau33fPwE1VGbvw?type=png|width=601,height=544!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNp9kE1LAzEQhv9KmNMW2j-wB6G6VgoKpVIPbnqYbmbdYL7Ix6GW_nezqaJV2lvm5XkfJnOAzgqCGt48uoE9rrlhLKTdaVx4ayIZMYaMzdtNIM-WOfI9drRls9kNu23nq2UJcydKa7YjXUpnrj_USfm_XJx37Zqcwv1Y-tH9kp0vcmG9bGqqhrRlG6csisll7r5qMAw7i_4ataieMHYDe5EhoZIfZeMr_ENVspW3vVQ0-foITEGT1yhFPvthDDnEgTRxqPNToH_nwM0xc5iifd6bDuroE00hOYGRGon5ChrqHlXIqUPzau33fPwE1VGbvw)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNp9kE1LAzEQhv9KmNMW2j-wB6G6VgoKpVIPbnqYbmbdYL7Ix6GW_nezqaJV2lvm5XkfJnOAzgqCGt48uoE9rrlhLKTdaVx4ayIZMYaMzdtNIM-WOfI9drRls9kNu23nq2UJcydKa7YjXUpnrj_USfm_XJx37Zqcwv1Y-tH9kp0vcmG9bGqqhrRlG6csisll7r5qMAw7i_4ataieMHYDe5EhoZIfZeMr_ENVspW3vVQ0-foITEGT1yhFPvthDDnEgTRxqPNToH_nwM0xc5iifd6bDuroE00hOYGRGon5ChrqHlXIqUPzau33fPwE1VGbvw)|smart-link]

Replay API REPL-3

EPIC: Replay Analysis Engine

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) Não atribuído Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:12 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Develop the analysis engine to generate meaningful insights and statistics from CS:GO/CS:2 demo data, empowering players to improve their performance.{quote}

*Goals:*

# *Player and Team Statistics:*
#* Create algorithms to accurately calculate essential player stats (e.g., K/D ratio, ADR, HSP, assists, deaths,MVPs, utility usage).
#* Compute team-level statistics (e.g., round win percentage, economic rating, objective control).
# *Key Moment Identification:*
#* Implement logic to detect and tag significant events within matches, such as:
#** Clutches (1vX situations)
#** Opening kills
#** Round-changing plays (e.g., multi-kills, bomb plants/defusals)
#** Economic resets
# *Advanced Visualizations:*
#* Develop systems to generate informative and visually appealing visualizations, including:
#** Heatmaps to illustrate player positioning and movement patterns.
#** Graphs to track stat trends over time or compare players.
#** Interactive timelines to highlight key events and match flow.
# *Machine Learning Integration (Optional):*
#* Explore the integration of machine learning models to:
#** Predict round outcomes based on player actions and game state.
#** Identify common behavioral patterns in winning/losing teams.
#** Offer personalized recommendations for improvement based on individual playstyle.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* *Accuracy:* The analysis engine consistently and accurately calculates player and team statistics.
* *Key Moment Detection:* Important in-game events are reliably identified and categorized.
* *Visualization Effectiveness:* Generated visualizations are clear, informative, and engaging.
* *Machine Learning Value (if applicable):* Machine learning models provide actionable insights and recommendations that help players improve their gameplay.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Algorithms:* Research and implement efficient algorithms for stat calculations and event detection.
* *Data Processing:* Optimize data processing pipelines for speed and scalability.
* *Visualization Libraries:* Evaluate suitable libraries (e.g., D3.js, Chart.js, [http://deck.gl|http://deck.gl|smart-link] ) for creating visualizations.
* *Machine Learning (Optional):* Optionally, consider usage of appropriate ML frameworks and algorithms for the desired features (e.g.,TensorFlow, PyTorch, XGBoost).

*Visual Representation (Mermaid Diagram):*

{noformat}Code snippet{noformat}

{noformat}graph LR
subgraph Data Input
A[Demo File (.dem)] --> B[Analysis Engine]
end
subgraph Analysis Engine
B[Analysis Engine] --> C[Player Stats]
B[Analysis Engine] --> D[Team Stats]
B[Analysis Engine] --> E[Key Moments]
B[Analysis Engine] --> F[Visualizations]
B[Analysis Engine] --> G[ML Models (Optional)]
end
{noformat}

*Explanation of Diagram:*

* The Demo File is the input to the Analysis Engine.
* The Analysis Engine processes the demo and produces multiple outputs:
** Player Stats
** Team Stats
** Key Moments
** Visualizations
** ML Models (Optional) 		21/mai/24 1:12 PM Em andamento purple

Replay API REPL-2

EPIC: Replay API Core Development

Epic Discovery & Refinement Medium Não resolvido(s) psavelis Leet Gaming Leet Gaming 21/mai/24 1:07 PM   21/mai/24 3:18 PM           0 1   *Description:*

{quote}Develop the foundation of the Replay API to facilitate the processing and analysis of CS:GO / CS:2 demo files.{quote}

*Goals:*

* *Demo File Parsing:* Establish robust parsing capabilities to extract game data from {{.dem}} files.
* *Data Modeling:* Create a comprehensive data model for storing and organizing extracted game information.
* *API Endpoints:* Construct RESTful API endpoints for:
** Uploading demos
** Retrieving analysis results
** Managing user data
* *Authorization:* Implement secure authorization mechanisms to ensure user access and data protection.

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* The API should adeptly parse CS:GO and CS:2 demo files across various versions.
* Extracted data must be accurately stored in the designated data model.
* API endpoints need to be fully functional and accessible with proper authentication measures in place.
* Core API functionalities should be thoroughly covered by unit and integration tests.

*Technical Considerations:*

* *Parser Library:* Evaluate libraries like {{node-csgo, infocs}} or build a custom parser.
* *Data Storage:* Determine optimal database (SQL, NoSQL) for storing demo data and analysis results.
* *API Framework:* No need to use heavy weight frameworks for building the API. Instead, implement core functionalities in order to reduce external dependencies and have a tailored framework for the Replay platform.
* *Authentication:* Consider using OAuth 2.0, JWT, or other established authentication protocols.

*Visual Representation DRAFT (Mermaid Diagram):*

!https://mermaid.ink/img/pako:eNp9U0tzgjAQ_iuZnOtBjx46YwUfrc4oTi8NHiLZaqYhYQjYMo7_vSEILUK8MGT3e_CF3QuOFAM8xseUJie0CkKJkM4P1XEqOMisLCE0IdVpjwaDZ_RCJpslmtMMvmmxLxEgWShb7H-ISqJNsjpTMlVxTCVDC_MQkO6d0DnZ5pAWLWDXtJbbcQaVVNfCynlD8p4IRRnyIFY172bvaFqiPyQBPRx4tt4i_yc6UXmEG623ZUmze0Gp87hJ6-pa6oLY4owLQLtMpbSxe0jzRmSTqgi07g3o6FYJR-6EI2fCjmI7oqttyUsykVQUmmvkyyOXtV23buGvxD-bUbTXAY5BqIblbwzux8cKvZF5Cd6uUABaiXPzuT2NHmdUge-KJW5FAjD_ZW2WS9wkW6VH7k0W10c0qxhK_ITNJcaUM7PDl5IU4uwEMYR4bF4ZTb9CHMqrwdE8U7tCRnicpTk84TxhZr08Ts19xXUxofJDKXP8pELD9Re1d1nC?type=png|width=1904,height=279,alt="preview"!

[https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNp9U0tzgjAQ_iuZnOtBjx46YwUfrc4oTi8NHiLZaqYhYQjYMo7_vSEILUK8MGT3e_CF3QuOFAM8xseUJie0CkKJkM4P1XEqOMisLCE0IdVpjwaDZ_RCJpslmtMMvmmxLxEgWShb7H-ISqJNsjpTMlVxTCVDC_MQkO6d0DnZ5pAWLWDXtJbbcQaVVNfCynlD8p4IRRnyIFY172bvaFqiPyQBPRx4tt4i_yc6UXmEG623ZUmze0Gp87hJ6-pa6oLY4owLQLtMpbSxe0jzRmSTqgi07g3o6FYJR-6EI2fCjmI7oqttyUsykVQUmmvkyyOXtV23buGvxD-bUbTXAY5BqIblbwzux8cKvZF5Cd6uUABaiXPzuT2NHmdUge-KJW5FAjD_ZW2WS9wkW6VH7k0W10c0qxhK_ITNJcaUM7PDl5IU4uwEMYR4bF4ZTb9CHMqrwdE8U7tCRnicpTk84TxhZr08Ts19xXUxofJDKXP8pELD9Re1d1nC)|https://mermaid.live/edit#pako:eNp9U0tzgjAQ_iuZnOtBjx46YwUfrc4oTi8NHiLZaqYhYQjYMo7_vSEILUK8MGT3e_CF3QuOFAM8xseUJie0CkKJkM4P1XEqOMisLCE0IdVpjwaDZ_RCJpslmtMMvmmxLxEgWShb7H-ISqJNsjpTMlVxTCVDC_MQkO6d0DnZ5pAWLWDXtJbbcQaVVNfCynlD8p4IRRnyIFY172bvaFqiPyQBPRx4tt4i_yc6UXmEG623ZUmze0Gp87hJ6-pa6oLY4owLQLtMpbSxe0jzRmSTqgi07g3o6FYJR-6EI2fCjmI7oqttyUsykVQUmmvkyyOXtV23buGvxD-bUbTXAY5BqIblbwzux8cKvZF5Cd6uUABaiXPzuT2NHmdUge-KJW5FAjD_ZW2WS9wkW6VH7k0W10c0qxhK_ITNJcaUM7PDl5IU4uwEMYR4bF4ZTb9CHMqrwdE8U7tCRnicpTk84TxhZr08Ts19xXUxofJDKXP8pELD9Re1d1nC)|smart-link]

{code:none}
graph LR
subgraph Client
A[Client] --> B[API Gateway]
end

subgraph API Gateway
B[API Gateway] --> C[Command Handler]
B[API Gateway] --> G[Query Handler]
end

subgraph Command Side
C[Command Handler] --> D1[Upload Demo Command]
D1[Upload Demo Command] --> E1[RabbitMQ Exchange]
E1[RabbitMQ Exchange] --> F1[Upload Demo Consumer]
F1[Upload Demo Consumer] --> H[Demo File Storage]
F1[Upload Demo Consumer] --> D2[Process Demo Command]
D2[Process Demo Command] --> E2[RabbitMQ Exchange]
E2[RabbitMQ Exchange] --> F2[Process Demo Consumer]
F2[Process Demo Consumer] --> I[Analysis Engine]
I[Analysis Engine] --> J[Event Store]
end

subgraph Query Side
G[Query Handler] --> K[GraphQL Resolver]
K[GraphQL Resolver] --> J[Event Store]
J[Event Store] --> L[Read Model]
L[Read Model] --> K[GraphQL Resolver]
end

K[GraphQL Resolver] --> A[Client]
